missions.localised_description: One of the Greenskins' fell gods has sent his scum into our realms. Drive them out!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Aenarion's bastard children dare to invade us! Destroy the usurpers, make Isha shed many tears!

missions.localised_description: Aenarion's bastard children dare to invade us! Destroy the usurpers, make Isha shed many tears!

localised_description.last_approved_text: They come from the south - the reptiles of fallen, decrepit gods. We will send them back to their makers!

missions.localised_description: They come from the south - the reptiles of fallen, decrepit gods. We will send them back to their makers!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ratmen come, defiling realms Atharti has set aside for the Druchii. The vermin must be pay - there can be no mercy!

missions.localised_description: The ratmen come, defiling realms Atharti has set aside for the Druchii. The vermin must be pay - there can be no mercy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Vampires come - thinking to cast dusk upon the Land of Chill - but the night is already here!

missions.localised_description: The Vampires come - thinking to cast dusk upon the Land of Chill - but the night is already here!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Asrai invade, spreading their decrepit Ghyran magic. Repulse and destroy.

missions.localised_description: The Asrai invade, spreading their decrepit Ghyran magic. Repulse and destroy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army of reptiles slither into our realms; it needs stamping on - as would any form of infestation.

missions.localised_description: An army of reptiles slither into our realms; it needs stamping on - as would any form of infestation.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Skavenblight sends a force of rats to undermine our realm. Show their Council what happens when it crosses the Witch King!

missions.localised_description: Skavenblight sends a force of rats to undermine our realm. Show their Council what happens when it crosses the Witch King!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An Undead host marches into your realms. Send our forces to unbind and destroy the corpse legion!

missions.localised_description: An Undead host marches into your realms. Send our forces to unbind and destroy the corpse legion!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A kindred of King Orion trespasses. The hypocrisy is staggering, they brook no intruders in their realms yet dare trespass in ours?

missions.localised_description: A kindred of King Orion trespasses. The hypocrisy is staggering, they brook no intruders in their realms yet dare trespass in ours?

localised_description.last_approved_text: An alliance is necessary - find one before the Hag Queens grow impatient. However, ensure we are the ones to end the pact - and on our terms.

missions.localised_description: An alliance is necessary - find one before the Hag Queens grow impatient. However, ensure we are the ones to end the pact - and on our terms.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Raid the nations of men - start with the fools and victims of Bretonnia.

missions.localised_description: Raid the nations of men - start with the fools and victims of Bretonnia.

localised_description.last_approved_text: if we do not strike first against this rival, he will come for us.

missions.localised_description: if we do not strike first against this rival, he will come for us.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dawi hoard riches and useful resources - if we take a few bearded slaves with us, then more's the better.

missions.localised_description: The Dawi hoard riches and useful resources - if we take a few bearded slaves with us, then more's the better.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The mannish empire is said to be a place of milk and honey… and now blood and death!

missions.localised_description: The mannish empire is said to be a place of milk and honey… and now blood and death!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Go to the Badlands and raid from the Greenskins - find their mounds of 'shiny stuff'.

missions.localised_description: Go to the Badlands and raid from the Greenskins - find their mounds of 'shiny stuff'.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Raid Ulthuan. Take every last resource, every soulstone and soul you can!

missions.localised_description: Raid Ulthuan. Take every last resource, every soulstone and soul you can!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Strike into the jungles - find what secrets the reptiles keep there.

missions.localised_description: Strike into the jungles - find what secrets the reptiles keep there.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Skaven gather Warpstone - it is of limited value to the Druchii, but we should take it to spite them all the same.

missions.localised_description: The Skaven gather Warpstone - it is of limited value to the Druchii, but we should take it to spite them all the same.

localised_description.last_approved_text: …may still horde power. Dark Magic and ancient lore is gathered and jealously guarded by Vampires and Necromancers - take it all!

missions.localised_description: …may still horde power. Dark Magic and ancient lore is gathered and jealously guarded by Vampires and Necromancers - take it all!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Raid Orion's realms: burn and destroy and bring back Asrai slaves!

missions.localised_description: Raid Orion's realms: burn and destroy and bring back Asrai slaves!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Age of Hateful Peace is long past. Muster the garrisons, the Druchii march to war!

missions.localised_description: The Age of Hateful Peace is long past. Muster the garrisons, the Druchii march to war!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time for spite is now - burn the mannish hovels to the ground!

missions.localised_description: The time for spite is now - burn the mannish hovels to the ground!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This culture is for the strong; mercy is weak. Raze and destroy your enemy's cities.

missions.localised_description: This culture is for the strong; mercy is weak. Raze and destroy your enemy's cities.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dawi mines may not burn but can easily be flooded with water or blood - it matters not which.

missions.localised_description: The Dawi mines may not burn but can easily be flooded with water or blood - it matters not which.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is time the men of the Empire knew that their god is a fraud. He will not come to save them. Let their nation burn!

missions.localised_description: It is time the men of the Empire knew that their god is a fraud. He will not come to save them. Let their nation burn!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We do to the Greenskins what they would do to our towers, but we do it with a certain flair!

missions.localised_description: We do to the Greenskins what they would do to our towers, but we do it with a certain flair!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Do you wish to live deliciously? Then burn and raze the homes of our despicable kin!

missions.localised_description: Do you wish to live deliciously? Then burn and raze the homes of our despicable kin!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The temple-cities are covered in gold. It is a metal that holds little value to us, yet depriving others of it is reward itself.

missions.localised_description: The temple-cities are covered in gold. It is a metal that holds little value to us, yet depriving others of it is reward itself.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Burn the burrows and tunnels of the Skaven, turn their networks into a furnace!

missions.localised_description: Burn the burrows and tunnels of the Skaven, turn their networks into a furnace!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The cities of the dead are shrouded in necrotic gasses - how easily they will burn!

missions.localised_description: The cities of the dead are shrouded in necrotic gasses - how easily they will burn!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The tree will burn - the Asrai shall see the home charred and destroyed. This is the way to greatness!

missions.localised_description: The tree will burn - the Asrai shall see the home charred and destroyed. This is the way to greatness!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Khaine demands, so we should provide.

missions.localised_description: Khaine demands, so we should provide.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The shadows are empty - it is time to fill them with murder!

missions.localised_description: The shadows are empty - it is time to fill them with murder!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Mistress of Magic calls forth a willing acolyte.

missions.localised_description: The Mistress of Magic calls forth a willing acolyte.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Have the bolt-wrights manufacture more artillery. If they hesitate, flog them.

missions.localised_description: Have the bolt-wrights manufacture more artillery. If they hesitate, flog them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Seek out more Cold Ones, so our warriors may ride steeds worthy of their majesty.

missions.localised_description: Seek out more Cold Ones, so our warriors may ride steeds worthy of their majesty.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time has come for the Dreadlords of the Citadels to release their best. The Age of Strife is here.

missions.localised_description: The time has come for the Dreadlords of the Citadels to release their best. The Age of Strife is here.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Asur think they are something at range - we shall blot out the sky with our firepower!

missions.localised_description: The Asur think they are something at range - we shall blot out the sky with our firepower!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Let Fly the Shards of Death

missions.localised_title: Let Fly the Shards of Death

localised_description.last_approved_text: Call upon Clar Karond - have the Beastmasters summon their pets.

missions.localised_description: Call upon Clar Karond - have the Beastmasters summon their pets.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The flower of Bretonnia unfurls; we should pick its most lustrous petal.

missions.localised_description: The flower of Bretonnia unfurls; we should pick its most lustrous petal.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The warherds need taming. Seek out their alpha and end him!

missions.localised_description: The warherds need taming. Seek out their alpha and end him!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Kaos comes - we should seek out their Champions, such as this one.

missions.localised_description: Kaos comes - we should seek out their Champions, such as this one.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Druchii coward wreaks havoc upon us. Send his soul to the Dark Gods!

missions.localised_description: The Druchii coward wreaks havoc upon us. Send his soul to the Dark Gods!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Find the short prideful one that frustrates us - silence his boasts and grudges.

missions.localised_description: Find the short prideful one that frustrates us - silence his boasts and grudges.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mankind sends their agent, but this child knows nothing of the world - his ignorance will be his undoing!

missions.localised_description: Mankind sends their agent, but this child knows nothing of the world - his ignorance will be his undoing!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Green Tide throws up a herald. Find and slay this nuisance.

missions.localised_description: The Green Tide throws up a herald. Find and slay this nuisance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Princes play games of intrigue, oblivious to the true peril. Silence him with the speed of Asuryan.

missions.localised_description: The Princes play games of intrigue, oblivious to the true peril. Silence him with the speed of Asuryan.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The jungle dwellers have unleashed a reptilian agent to frustrate us; it needs dealing with.

missions.localised_description: The jungle dwellers have unleashed a reptilian agent to frustrate us; it needs dealing with.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Skaven are up to mischief. Hunt down their agent, find out what it thinks it knows and silence it!

missions.localised_description: The Skaven are up to mischief. Hunt down their agent, find out what it thinks it knows and silence it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The mayflies - mankind - look upon us with jealously, wanting our lifespans and cheating death to do so. Look at this creature as an example.

missions.localised_description: The mayflies - mankind - look upon us with jealously, wanting our lifespans and cheating death to do so. Look at this creature as an example.

localised_description.last_approved_text: While we oft-remain cordial with our Asrai cousins, occasionally the king's followers stray too far from the woods…

missions.localised_description: While we oft-remain cordial with our Asrai cousins, occasionally the king's followers stray too far from the woods…

localised_description.last_approved_text: That mankind thinks it owns the western coasts of the continent is amusing; that they think to keep them, even more so.

missions.localised_description: That mankind thinks it owns the western coasts of the continent is amusing; that they think to keep them, even more so.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Druchii make much of invading Ulthuan, let us see how they react when we take their frozen lands.

missions.localised_description: The Druchii make much of invading Ulthuan, let us see how they react when we take their frozen lands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Must we take their dirty, dark, musty, horrid mines?

missions.localised_description: Must we take their dirty, dark, musty, horrid mines?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Empire have proven an ineffective bulwark against the Dark Gods - it is time to claim the lands for the Asur.

missions.localised_description: The Empire have proven an ineffective bulwark against the Dark Gods - it is time to claim the lands for the Asur.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The lands of the green tide must be taken and risen so that the fell sea of green stench is contained.

missions.localised_description: The lands of the green tide must be taken and risen so that the fell sea of green stench is contained.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These lands were once ruled by your ancestors. It is time they were returned!

missions.localised_description: These lands were once ruled by your ancestors. It is time they were returned!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Claim the jungle - the secrets within will enlighten us all.

missions.localised_description: Claim the jungle - the secrets within will enlighten us all.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Take the lands of the Skaven, if only to cleanse and scour them.

missions.localised_description: Take the lands of the Skaven, if only to cleanse and scour them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We must invade the dead realms and bring life to the desolate soil.

missions.localised_description: We must invade the dead realms and bring life to the desolate soil.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our Asrai cousins must understand that their realms have always been those of the Phoenix Throne; it is only now that we must enforce that claim.

missions.localised_description: Our Asrai cousins must understand that their realms have always been those of the Phoenix Throne; it is only now that we must enforce that claim.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Bretonnians are not our allies. They think in the short term as befits their lifespans. We must act.

missions.localised_description: The Bretonnians are not our allies. They think in the short term as befits their lifespans. We must act.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is only one answer when dealing with the Children of Chaos - war!

missions.localised_description: There is only one answer when dealing with the Children of Chaos - war!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dark Gods and their mortal followers must be stopped. The Asur go to war!

missions.localised_description: The Dark Gods and their mortal followers must be stopped. The Asur go to war!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The longest war - the most bitter of all wars - begins again!

missions.localised_description: The longest war - the most bitter of all wars - begins again!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs spout about the grudges accrued by the Asur. Time to strike our own record!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfs spout about the grudges accrued by the Asur. Time to strike our own record!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Come, Men of the Empire, face the might of the Asur!

missions.localised_description: Come, Men of the Empire, face the might of the Asur!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Orcs have ever-been a blunt spear in our flank. It is time to go on the offensive and snap its accursed shaft!

missions.localised_description: The Orcs have ever-been a blunt spear in our flank. It is time to go on the offensive and snap its accursed shaft!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Civil war may be rare but it is not unheard of. Once more a Prince's intrigue spills out onto the battlefield.

missions.localised_description: Civil war may be rare but it is not unheard of. Once more a Prince's intrigue spills out onto the battlefield.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The reptiles are keepers of great power, which is needed, but they obfuscate. Unfortunately, war is the only answer.

missions.localised_description: The reptiles are keepers of great power, which is needed, but they obfuscate. Unfortunately, war is the only answer.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There can only be war against the rat-men; their kind deserve nothing less.

missions.localised_description: There can only be war against the rat-men; their kind deserve nothing less.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Unliving are an offence to the Goddess Isha; the Everqueen has deigned they cannot be allowed to exist.

missions.localised_description: The Unliving are an offence to the Goddess Isha; the Everqueen has deigned they cannot be allowed to exist.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is regrettable, but the Asur and Asrai must go to war.

missions.localised_description: It is regrettable, but the Asur and Asrai must go to war.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Royarch of the Bretonni or his Fay-mistress have wronged us. Seek either out in battle.

missions.localised_description: The Royarch of the Bretonni or his Fay-mistress have wronged us. Seek either out in battle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Send the hosts, hunt the warherds, and take the horns from their most powerful beasts!

missions.localised_description: Send the hosts, hunt the warherds, and take the horns from their most powerful beasts!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Champions of Order must seek out the Champions of Destruction! Let it be so!

missions.localised_description: The Champions of Order must seek out the Champions of Destruction! Let it be so!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Khainite Assassins are not the only ones who can target death; we will seek out the wretched bloodline who brought the Sundering down upon us!

missions.localised_description: The Khainite Assassins are not the only ones who can target death; we will seek out the wretched bloodline who brought the Sundering down upon us!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Find the stunted king and take his crown… and his beard for our collection!

missions.localised_description: Find the stunted king and take his crown… and his beard for our collection!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Emperor has proven a threat to the Asur, the kindest and quickest solution is his swift elimination; seek him or his representative out in battle!

missions.localised_description: The Emperor has proven a threat to the Asur, the kindest and quickest solution is his swift elimination; seek him or his representative out in battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Find the Orc Warboss, take the beast's head, and watch his hordes flee!

missions.localised_description: Find the Orc Warboss, take the beast's head, and watch his hordes flee!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It was destined to come to this… brother vs. brother - prince vs. prince. The land drenched in blood.

missions.localised_description: It was destined to come to this… brother vs. brother - prince vs. prince. The land drenched in blood.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The reptiles of Lustria are lost children to a fallen race. We must usher in a new era; their leaders are the cost of this transition.

missions.localised_description: The reptiles of Lustria are lost children to a fallen race. We must usher in a new era; their leaders are the cost of this transition.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Lost Children of the Old Ones

missions.localised_title: Lost Children of the Old Ones

localised_description.last_approved_text: We must risk disease by coming into contact with the Skaven… yet their leaders must be brought to battle!

missions.localised_description: We must risk disease by coming into contact with the Skaven… yet their leaders must be brought to battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Vampires have a Khaine-cursed habit of returning to life. Seek out their leaders and take their heads!

missions.localised_description: The Vampires have a Khaine-cursed habit of returning to life. Seek out their leaders and take their heads!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We must bring silence to the forest - the Kings in the Wood must fall!

missions.localised_description: We must bring silence to the forest - the Kings in the Wood must fall!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A show of force is required for the stubborn men - one of their champions must die so they may learn.

missions.localised_description: A show of force is required for the stubborn men - one of their champions must die so they may learn.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Such primitives only understand one thing. Take down their alpha-brute, spay it - kill it - and then they will know they are beaten.

missions.localised_description: Such primitives only understand one thing. Take down their alpha-brute, spay it - kill it - and then they will know they are beaten.

localised_description.last_approved_text: In the battle's wake, find the mortal Champion of Chaos. The Asur will overcome!

missions.localised_description: In the battle's wake, find the mortal Champion of Chaos. The Asur will overcome!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Druchii are obsessed with vengeance over a slight of their own making - now we should give them a real reason for their anger! Find their leaders and slay one!

missions.localised_description: The Druchii are obsessed with vengeance over a slight of their own making - now we should give them a real reason for their anger! Find their leaders and slay one!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Seek out Dwarf Thanes and Lords and weave your own cloak from their filthy, Dawi whiskers!

missions.localised_description: Seek out Dwarf Thanes and Lords and weave your own cloak from their filthy, Dawi whiskers!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mankind's warriors are so sure of themselves - let's see just how sure when they face our martial prowess!

missions.localised_description: Mankind's warriors are so sure of themselves - let's see just how sure when they face our martial prowess!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Orcs follow yet another of their thuggish kind; strike it down in front of its followers, so they know of their impotence!

missions.localised_description: The Orcs follow yet another of their thuggish kind; strike it down in front of its followers, so they know of their impotence!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Insults at court are one thing, but in battle it is actions, not words, that will win the day.

missions.localised_description: Insults at court are one thing, but in battle it is actions, not words, that will win the day.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Saurian ancients send a scarred champion against us. It is slow - our speed and precision should make this an easy match…

missions.localised_description: The Saurian ancients send a scarred champion against us. It is slow - our speed and precision should make this an easy match…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The vermin have leaders that cower behind their own kind! Such cowardice should not be a surprise - show them why they should fear our coming!

missions.localised_description: The vermin have leaders that cower behind their own kind! Such cowardice should not be a surprise - show them why they should fear our coming!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The weakness of the Undead hordes is their need of champions for animus. Kill their fell leaders and the entire army will fall!

missions.localised_description: The weakness of the Undead hordes is their need of champions for animus. Kill their fell leaders and the entire army will fall!

localised_title.last_approved_text: What is Dead Should Really Die

missions.localised_title: What is Dead Should Really Die

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Asrai are not our natural enemies, but their stubbornness causes ire. A quick kill of a Noble in battle may sway them to the true cause.

missions.localised_description: The Asrai are not our natural enemies, but their stubbornness causes ire. A quick kill of a Noble in battle may sway them to the true cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Knights of Bretonnia are laughable versions of our own proud Silver Helms - meet them in battle and show them why!

missions.localised_description: The Knights of Bretonnia are laughable versions of our own proud Silver Helms - meet them in battle and show them why!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is little else to say - it is time to bring the warherds to battle!

missions.localised_description: There is little else to say - it is time to bring the warherds to battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Find the Chaos horde - bring forth Aenarion's fury!

missions.localised_description: Find the Chaos horde - bring forth Aenarion's fury!

localised_description.last_approved_text: No longer on the defensive, it is the Asur's time to act - bring the fight to the Dark Elves and win!

missions.localised_description: No longer on the defensive, it is the Asur's time to act - bring the fight to the Dark Elves and win!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our warhost shall meet the Dwarfen throng and it will be beards that are lost, not Elven locks.

missions.localised_description: Our warhost shall meet the Dwarfen throng and it will be beards that are lost, not Elven locks.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Men are too focused on their own glory, so we must therefore bring them to battle for a lesson that needs teaching!

missions.localised_description: Men are too focused on their own glory, so we must therefore bring them to battle for a lesson that needs teaching!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Orcs rampage and their path is therefore difficult to predict, even for our Mages. Better to hunt this mob and end it!

missions.localised_description: Orcs rampage and their path is therefore difficult to predict, even for our Mages. Better to hunt this mob and end it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We are forced to march on our own kin. The tears of Isha will flow!

missions.localised_description: We are forced to march on our own kin. The tears of Isha will flow!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The thralls of Ladrielle invade. Make them regret that decision!

missions.localised_description: The thralls of Ladrielle invade. Make them regret that decision!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Cloven Ones invade - repel the Beastmen, and send a message to their dark masters that Ulthuan remains pure!

missions.localised_description: The Cloven Ones invade - repel the Beastmen, and send a message to their dark masters that Ulthuan remains pure!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Just as Aenarion did before his ascension to the Phoenix Throne, we must repel a Chaos invasion.

missions.localised_description: Just as Aenarion did before his ascension to the Phoenix Throne, we must repel a Chaos invasion.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Druchii return - a bitter desperate invasion. Repel them just as you did at Finuval Plain!

missions.localised_description: The Druchii return - a bitter desperate invasion. Repel them just as you did at Finuval Plain!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is the Dwarfs - both ancient allies and foes - that seek our doom. We'll fill their tome of grudges for this!

missions.localised_description: It is the Dwarfs - both ancient allies and foes - that seek our doom. We'll fill their tome of grudges for this!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Emperor of men has made a grave mistake - the Phoenix Throne is not his to take. Show the mortals why!

missions.localised_description: The Emperor of men has made a grave mistake - the Phoenix Throne is not his to take. Show the mortals why!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Greenskin invasion will fail just as it did when led by that putrid Goblin, Grom the Paunch.

missions.localised_description: This Greenskin invasion will fail just as it did when led by that putrid Goblin, Grom the Paunch.

localised_description.last_approved_text: So it is war within the kingdoms of Ulthuan - such sorrow! We must be victorious so order can be quickly restored.

missions.localised_description: So it is war within the kingdoms of Ulthuan - such sorrow! We must be victorious so order can be quickly restored.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The servants of the Old Ones fail to adapt as the world changes, and now they invade! They shall fail.

missions.localised_description: The servants of the Old Ones fail to adapt as the world changes, and now they invade! They shall fail.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We must not let the filthy ratmen sully the shores of our homeland. Halt the Vermintide at all costs!

missions.localised_description: We must not let the filthy ratmen sully the shores of our homeland. Halt the Vermintide at all costs!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The dead come - corpses of mortal men, led by Vampires who seek our power. Strike them down with magic and sword combined!

missions.localised_description: The dead come - corpses of mortal men, led by Vampires who seek our power. Strike them down with magic and sword combined!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The dogs of the King in the Woods and their keepers dare to stray beyond the Worldroots and invade us! They must be stopped!

missions.localised_description: The dogs of the King in the Woods and their keepers dare to stray beyond the Worldroots and invade us! They must be stopped!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Saurian warriors are hunting in Asur lands! We must not become prey - we must seek them out.

missions.localised_description: Saurian warriors are hunting in Asur lands! We must not become prey - we must seek them out.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Skaven army dares to corrupt and plague our realms! The Everqueen orders their destruction, and so we obey.

missions.localised_description: A Skaven army dares to corrupt and plague our realms! The Everqueen orders their destruction, and so we obey.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Vampire marches his dregs across our lands - syphon Dark Magic and see these corpses return to natural death.

missions.localised_description: A Vampire marches his dregs across our lands - syphon Dark Magic and see these corpses return to natural death.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The King in the Woods sends guards into Asur realms - a trespass that must be answered!

missions.localised_description: The King in the Woods sends guards into Asur realms - a trespass that must be answered!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We must ally with the short-lived if we are to beat those that bring darkness to our shores.

missions.localised_description: We must ally with the short-lived if we are to beat those that bring darkness to our shores.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Finubar, at the behest of his war council, sends forth a call to muster - one which every Asur must answer.

missions.localised_description: Finubar, at the behest of his war council, sends forth a call to muster - one which every Asur must answer.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The cities of Bretonnia are a foul parody of the Elven havens they were built upon. Imitation is not flattery!

missions.localised_description: The cities of Bretonnia are a foul parody of the Elven havens they were built upon. Imitation is not flattery!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The spires of Naggaroth, should be toppled - it is our duty!

missions.localised_description: The spires of Naggaroth, should be toppled - it is our duty!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfholds are crude affairs - both aesthetically and in how they harm the foundations of the mountains themselves.

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfholds are crude affairs - both aesthetically and in how they harm the foundations of the mountains themselves.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The mannish hovels are sprawling hives of scum and knavery - it does them good to see such affronts to construction burn.

missions.localised_description: The mannish hovels are sprawling hives of scum and knavery - it does them good to see such affronts to construction burn.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is a surprise to see that Orcs live anywhere, but these dwellings hurt the eyes - they should be scoured from sight.

missions.localised_description: It is a surprise to see that Orcs live anywhere, but these dwellings hurt the eyes - they should be scoured from sight.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The king demands punishment for rebels and traitors!

missions.localised_description: The king demands punishment for rebels and traitors!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Cities of the Lizardmen spent much of their existence lost - make sure these ones remain lost forever!

missions.localised_description: Cities of the Lizardmen spent much of their existence lost - make sure these ones remain lost forever!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Skaven long desire to land on Ulthuan - destroying their burrows and nests will fetter them from the ocean.

missions.localised_description: The Skaven long desire to land on Ulthuan - destroying their burrows and nests will fetter them from the ocean.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The gravesites and necropolises of the Undead are abhorrent to Asuryan and must be destroyed when encountered.

missions.localised_description: The gravesites and necropolises of the Undead are abhorrent to Asuryan and must be destroyed when encountered.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Destroy the tree halls, and may Lileath forgive us!

missions.localised_description: Destroy the tree halls, and may Lileath forgive us!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our Nobles must be tested in battle, before they join the courts in governance - send for one.

missions.localised_description: Our Nobles must be tested in battle, before they join the courts in governance - send for one.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Loremasters are knowledgeable and well spoken, making fine dignitaries.

missions.localised_description: The Loremasters are knowledgeable and well spoken, making fine dignitaries.

localised_description.last_approved_text: High Magic is one that only the mages of Ulthuan can wield - the Slann are a spent force. Send to the White Tower and summon one now.

missions.localised_description: High Magic is one that only the mages of Ulthuan can wield - the Slann are a spent force. Send to the White Tower and summon one now.

localised_description.last_approved_text: More artillery is needed. Set the bolt-wrights to work!

missions.localised_description: More artillery is needed. Set the bolt-wrights to work!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Swift Elven steeds, and the warriors who bear them, are the best in the world.

missions.localised_description: Swift Elven steeds, and the warriors who bear them, are the best in the world.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is nothing like the gleaming spears and purity of a High Elf warhost. Summon it!

missions.localised_description: There is nothing like the gleaming spears and purity of a High Elf warhost. Summon it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Few can match the archers of Ulthuan, for they are the best in the world. Will they answer the muster?

missions.localised_description: Few can match the archers of Ulthuan, for they are the best in the world. Will they answer the muster?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The bestial allies of the High Elves have ever been the Dragons of Caledor - it time to rouse them.

missions.localised_description: The bestial allies of the High Elves have ever been the Dragons of Caledor - it time to rouse them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This trespasser shuns the Old Ones and worships some warmblood construction that lurks in a pond! Destroy!

missions.localised_description: This trespasser shuns the Old Ones and worships some warmblood construction that lurks in a pond! Destroy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This creature is an abomination of the Ancient Enemy's design. It must be silenced!

missions.localised_description: This creature is an abomination of the Ancient Enemy's design. It must be silenced!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Ancient Enemy has many mortal servants - this one offends the Old Ones.

missions.localised_description: The Ancient Enemy has many mortal servants - this one offends the Old Ones.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Elf-spawn warmblood consorts with the enemies of the Old Ones. It must be cleansed from the plane.

missions.localised_description: The Elf-spawn warmblood consorts with the enemies of the Old Ones. It must be cleansed from the plane.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those who delve - Dwarf-spawn - send one of their number to frustrate us. Eliminate it.

missions.localised_description: Those who delve - Dwarf-spawn - send one of their number to frustrate us. Eliminate it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Untamed Ones prove themselves unworthy, but this is not a new concept. Nevertheless, our masters have ordered this one's death.

missions.localised_description: The Untamed Ones prove themselves unworthy, but this is not a new concept. Nevertheless, our masters have ordered this one's death.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The enemy that is green send one of their number against us. Destroy it.

missions.localised_description: The enemy that is green send one of their number against us. Destroy it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Elf-spawn meddle in our affairs once more. Our masters have decreed that the death of this one should be a fitting chastisement.

missions.localised_description: Elf-spawn meddle in our affairs once more. Our masters have decreed that the death of this one should be a fitting chastisement.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A younger Mage-Priest has misinterpreted the Great Plan. Purging one of his servants will be the most efficient method of realignment.

missions.localised_description: A younger Mage-Priest has misinterpreted the Great Plan. Purging one of his servants will be the most efficient method of realignment.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Xa'kota send one of their agents against us. Sotek's wrath upon it!

missions.localised_description: The Xa'kota send one of their agents against us. Sotek's wrath upon it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those that defile the Old Ones rules on life have a creature that threatens us. It must be hunted and destroyed!

missions.localised_description: Those that defile the Old Ones rules on life have a creature that threatens us. It must be hunted and destroyed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: These servants must return to the island and leave the trees. Take the life of one to teach them the error of their ways.

missions.localised_description: These servants must return to the island and leave the trees. Take the life of one to teach them the error of their ways.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The armoured, untamed ones that ride upon fast-moving mammals... their lands have been declared forfeit by the Great Plan.

missions.localised_description: The armoured, untamed ones that ride upon fast-moving mammals... their lands have been declared forfeit by the Great Plan.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Elven servants denigrate their purpose… to serve. Now, they consort with Daemon-spawn. We must flush them from the cold lands they have mistakenly declared their own.

missions.localised_description: The Elven servants denigrate their purpose… to serve. Now, they consort with Daemon-spawn. We must flush them from the cold lands they have mistakenly declared their own.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The short warmbloods have delved too far. It is against the Great Plan to dig that deep. Take the mountains from them!

missions.localised_description: The short warmbloods have delved too far. It is against the Great Plan to dig that deep. Take the mountains from them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The cosmos screams, for it knows that the untamed ones wander too far and too quickly. Their realms must be vanquished!

missions.localised_description: The cosmos screams, for it knows that the untamed ones wander too far and too quickly. Their realms must be vanquished!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The fungal parasites that have taken hold of this world must be cleansed from the lands. So commands the Lord of the Solar-City.

missions.localised_description: The fungal parasites that have taken hold of this world must be cleansed from the lands. So commands the Lord of the Solar-City.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The servants were left on an island paradise - ringed by the World Pond - but they have proven incompetent in its care. Cold-blooded stewards are needed.

missions.localised_description: The servants were left on an island paradise - ringed by the World Pond - but they have proven incompetent in its care. Cold-blooded stewards are needed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Geomantic Web weakens due to dissonance and corruption - restorative methods are immediately required.

missions.localised_description: The Geomantic Web weakens due to dissonance and corruption - restorative methods are immediately required.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An infestation plagues the world and Sotek demands action. Take the lands back from the Rat-spawn - purge it of their taint!

missions.localised_description: An infestation plagues the world and Sotek demands action. Take the lands back from the Rat-spawn - purge it of their taint!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Lift the shroud from the lands inhabited by the dead meat that refuses to die!

missions.localised_description: Lift the shroud from the lands inhabited by the dead meat that refuses to die!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those Ringed By Ocean have strayed far from the Old Ones intent. Some have taken refuge in the Worldroots. This is against the Great Plan and must be corrected.

missions.localised_description: Those Ringed By Ocean have strayed far from the Old Ones intent. Some have taken refuge in the Worldroots. This is against the Great Plan and must be corrected.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The younger race of mankind must be chastised.

missions.localised_description: The younger race of mankind must be chastised.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The horned abominations of the Ancient Enemy must be fought and destroyed.

missions.localised_description: The horned abominations of the Ancient Enemy must be fought and destroyed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There can be only war against the Ancient Enemy. No other course is to be considered.

missions.localised_description: There can be only war against the Ancient Enemy. No other course is to be considered.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We can no longer tolerate the misbehaviour of the Old Ones' servants, especially those who dwell in the north. It is war!

missions.localised_description: We can no longer tolerate the misbehaviour of the Old Ones' servants, especially those who dwell in the north. It is war!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Those who live under the mountains are close to extinction. We should not let them linger…

missions.localised_description: Those who live under the mountains are close to extinction. We should not let them linger…

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our masters have consorted with the stars and declared that war upon the warmbloods is the only answer.

missions.localised_description: Our masters have consorted with the stars and declared that war upon the warmbloods is the only answer.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We must give these creatures what they most desire... war.

missions.localised_description: We must give these creatures what they most desire... war.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Great Plan has been lenient towards the Elf-spawn... until now.

missions.localised_description: The Great Plan has been lenient towards the Elf-spawn... until now.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Following a disagreement between two Mage-Priests - one that has been three millennia in the making - there will now be a short war, culminating in realignment.

missions.localised_description: Following a disagreement between two Mage-Priests - one that has been three millennia in the making - there will now be a short war, culminating in realignment.

localised_description.last_approved_text: All vermin must be purged from this world. It is a cosmic decree, the absolute desire of Sotek. Let it begin.

missions.localised_description: All vermin must be purged from this world. It is a cosmic decree, the absolute desire of Sotek. Let it begin.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Undead should not exist. Death is permanence. And so Order must be restored.

missions.localised_description: The Undead should not exist. Death is permanence. And so Order must be restored.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Elf-spawn of the far colonies have invoked the ire of the Old Ones. It can only be war.

missions.localised_description: The Elf-spawn of the far colonies have invoked the ire of the Old Ones. It can only be war.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The hunt is on. Seek out their leader and devour them!

missions.localised_description: The hunt is on. Seek out their leader and devour them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Ours is a race of eons; theirs, but a few millennia. Show the beasts why by slaughtering their Lord! Tlanxla demands!

missions.localised_description: Ours is a race of eons; theirs, but a few millennia. Show the beasts why by slaughtering their Lord! Tlanxla demands!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is no greater sacrifice to bring before the Star Chamber: the head of the being who represents the ultimate enemies!

missions.localised_description: There is no greater sacrifice to bring before the Star Chamber: the head of the being who represents the ultimate enemies!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Night surrounds this one. So immersed in darkness, we are blind. Help the Mage-Priests see by its elimination!

missions.localised_description: Night surrounds this one. So immersed in darkness, we are blind. Help the Mage-Priests see by its elimination!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Beard-spawn falsely claim a debt against us. We are the ones who meter punishment to the younger races. Take their king as a reminder.

missions.localised_description: The Beard-spawn falsely claim a debt against us. We are the ones who meter punishment to the younger races. Take their king as a reminder.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These children know nothing of the horrors we must face. They get in our way - especially this one. The only answer is his sacrifice - make the necessary preparations!

missions.localised_description: These children know nothing of the horrors we must face. They get in our way - especially this one. The only answer is his sacrifice - make the necessary preparations!

localised_description.last_approved_text: These beasts are like a writhing serpent. Take its head - hopefully it will not grow back!

missions.localised_description: These beasts are like a writhing serpent. Take its head - hopefully it will not grow back!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Once more we must remind the Elf-spawn of their place: a more permanent punishment is deemed necessary via the removal of their leader.

missions.localised_description: Once more we must remind the Elf-spawn of their place: a more permanent punishment is deemed necessary via the removal of their leader.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Skinks have read and re-read the sacred plaques but have come to the same conclusion: for the great purpose to progress, this one must die.

missions.localised_description: The Skinks have read and re-read the sacred plaques but have come to the same conclusion: for the great purpose to progress, this one must die.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This should not need saying, but the Rat-spawn leader must die! See to it!

missions.localised_description: This should not need saying, but the Rat-spawn leader must die! See to it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The unnatural one flouts sacred laws laid down by the Old Ones. It must be eliminated in battle!

missions.localised_description: The unnatural one flouts sacred laws laid down by the Old Ones. It must be eliminated in battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Complexities with the Geomantic Web and entanglement with the Worldroots leave us no choice but to seek the end of their leader.

missions.localised_description: Complexities with the Geomantic Web and entanglement with the Worldroots leave us no choice but to seek the end of their leader.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This untamed one is causing discordance, like grit between scales. Hunt and kill!

missions.localised_description: This untamed one is causing discordance, like grit between scales. Hunt and kill!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Find this warm-blooded beast and slay it on the battlefield. A worthy sacrifice to Tlanxla!

missions.localised_description: Find this warm-blooded beast and slay it on the battlefield. A worthy sacrifice to Tlanxla!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is time to hunt! The mummified remains of Lord Kroak stir - it demands the spilling of blood, the death of one aligned to the Ancient Enemy.

missions.localised_description: It is time to hunt! The mummified remains of Lord Kroak stir - it demands the spilling of blood, the death of one aligned to the Ancient Enemy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is prey about: an Elf-spawn who defiles our sacred sites. Caxuatn, the Predator, demands that you hunt!

missions.localised_description: There is prey about: an Elf-spawn who defiles our sacred sites. Caxuatn, the Predator, demands that you hunt!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This warmblood has caused great annoyance - it bellows and wears unsightly hair under its maw. It must be hunted in battle and slain!

missions.localised_description: This warmblood has caused great annoyance - it bellows and wears unsightly hair under its maw. It must be hunted in battle and slain!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The arrogance of these younger races must be brought to task. Show them true power by culling one of their number in battle.

missions.localised_description: The arrogance of these younger races must be brought to task. Show them true power by culling one of their number in battle.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Saurus were not merely bred for war, but designed for it. Show the green warmbloods why, by killing the most powerful of their number.

missions.localised_description: The Saurus were not merely bred for war, but designed for it. Show the green warmbloods why, by killing the most powerful of their number.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The servants have spawned a troublesome creature which meddles with things it does not comprehend. Hunt it down in battle!

missions.localised_description: The servants have spawned a troublesome creature which meddles with things it does not comprehend. Hunt it down in battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This one defies the commands of our revered masters. It has been defined as prey. Begin the hunt!

missions.localised_description: This one defies the commands of our revered masters. It has been defined as prey. Begin the hunt!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Rat-abominations are cowards! The Mage-Priests have defined one to slay in battle which will make the rest flee.

missions.localised_description: The Rat-abominations are cowards! The Mage-Priests have defined one to slay in battle which will make the rest flee.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Undead Plague is connected to one of their powerful magic-users. If we hunt this locust and kill it in battle the corpses will atrophy.

missions.localised_description: The Undead Plague is connected to one of their powerful magic-users. If we hunt this locust and kill it in battle the corpses will atrophy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: To halt the Elf-spawn advance we must hunt their champion. Only in battle will the death honour Tlanxla!

missions.localised_description: To halt the Elf-spawn advance we must hunt their champion. Only in battle will the death honour Tlanxla!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A warmblood cohort of Untamed Ones approaches. It must be destroyed.

missions.localised_description: A warmblood cohort of Untamed Ones approaches. It must be destroyed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Old Ones have spoken - these horned abominations of the Ancient Enemy should be terminated. Now.

missions.localised_description: The Old Ones have spoken - these horned abominations of the Ancient Enemy should be terminated. Now.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Ancient Enemy sends forth their abhorrent legions - spawn the cohorts and destroy them!

missions.localised_description: The Ancient Enemy sends forth their abhorrent legions - spawn the cohorts and destroy them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The dark-hearted Elf-spawn need castigation. Begin the hunt!

missions.localised_description: The dark-hearted Elf-spawn need castigation. Begin the hunt!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ones that delve are defined by their greed, but now their avarice affects the Great Plan. They must be confronted!

missions.localised_description: The ones that delve are defined by their greed, but now their avarice affects the Great Plan. They must be confronted!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Let the Saurus taste the air - it smells of man-flesh. Begin the cull.

missions.localised_description: Let the Saurus taste the air - it smells of man-flesh. Begin the cull.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Orc-spawn come, and we will meet their brash challenge. Send the cohorts forth!

missions.localised_description: The Orc-spawn come, and we will meet their brash challenge. Send the cohorts forth!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The servants of the island are troublesome; their warhost must be culled.

missions.localised_description: The servants of the island are troublesome; their warhost must be culled.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Intruders! The warmbloods invade. They must be destroyed!

missions.localised_description: Intruders! The warmbloods invade. They must be destroyed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Cloven warmbloods dare to sully the lands of the Old Ones. Spawn defenders!

missions.localised_description: The Cloven warmbloods dare to sully the lands of the Old Ones. Spawn defenders!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The servants of the Ancient Enemy come to invade. They must be stopped!

missions.localised_description: The servants of the Ancient Enemy come to invade. They must be stopped!

localised_description.last_approved_text: They come from the north to take our Cold Ones, but no longer! Halt the invasion of the Dark Ones!

missions.localised_description: They come from the north to take our Cold Ones, but no longer! Halt the invasion of the Dark Ones!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Here come the warmbloods upon their short stunted legs - let them see our teeth!

missions.localised_description: Here come the warmbloods upon their short stunted legs - let them see our teeth!

localised_description.last_approved_text: From across the World Pond they come to plunder and invade. Such insolence! Defend and punish!

missions.localised_description: From across the World Pond they come to plunder and invade. Such insolence! Defend and punish!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Greenskins come and swamp us, trampling through ancient sites. The spawn must be stopped. Repulsed. Destroyed!

missions.localised_description: The Greenskins come and swamp us, trampling through ancient sites. The spawn must be stopped. Repulsed. Destroyed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The island servants seek to invade sacred realms. They have forgotten their place and their status! Remind them!

missions.localised_description: The island servants seek to invade sacred realms. They have forgotten their place and their status! Remind them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Fellow Saurians run amok! They invade our realms, which is not part of the Great Plan. We must defend ourselves!

missions.localised_description: Fellow Saurians run amok! They invade our realms, which is not part of the Great Plan. We must defend ourselves!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This is not the first time the Rat-spawn have sought to invade our realms from below. Sotek will have his vengeance - we are his tools!

missions.localised_description: This is not the first time the Rat-spawn have sought to invade our realms from below. Sotek will have his vengeance - we are his tools!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Corpse-spawn tread on ancient paths… an invading swarm. They are trespassers, whether living or dead, see to their true demise!

missions.localised_description: Corpse-spawn tread on ancient paths… an invading swarm. They are trespassers, whether living or dead, see to their true demise!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Elf-spawn seek to invade us, but they do not know our trees as we do. Defend the jungle!

missions.localised_description: The Elf-spawn seek to invade us, but they do not know our trees as we do. Defend the jungle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: These Saurian invaders are discordant! Seek them out and destroy.

missions.localised_description: These Saurian invaders are discordant! Seek them out and destroy.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An accursed Rat-swarm is loose - send forth your warriors and hunt the vermin prey!

missions.localised_description: An accursed Rat-swarm is loose - send forth your warriors and hunt the vermin prey!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The smell of death leads a trail that can easily be scented by tongue and nose. Hunt down the Corpse-abominations and see them returned to their natural state!

missions.localised_description: The smell of death leads a trail that can easily be scented by tongue and nose. Hunt down the Corpse-abominations and see them returned to their natural state!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Elf-spawn from across the world pond send a host. Intercept them and feast on their warmblood flesh!

missions.localised_description: The Elf-spawn from across the world pond send a host. Intercept them and feast on their warmblood flesh!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The plaques show what is already witnessed in the constellations. An alliance is not only expected but necessary!

missions.localised_description: The plaques show what is already witnessed in the constellations. An alliance is not only expected but necessary!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Order the pool-keepers to scatter the seeds - the spawnings pools must begin gestation!

missions.localised_description: Order the pool-keepers to scatter the seeds - the spawnings pools must begin gestation!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Untamed Ones have their own inferior cities and settlements - all their works must be destroyed!

missions.localised_description: The Untamed Ones have their own inferior cities and settlements - all their works must be destroyed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Tear down the cities of despair - let the Elf-spawn know they should have stayed upon their island paradise, gifted to them by the Old Ones. They are ungrateful.

missions.localised_description: Tear down the cities of despair - let the Elf-spawn know they should have stayed upon their island paradise, gifted to them by the Old Ones. They are ungrateful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Mountains were a gift from the Old Ones: sculptures which the warmblood delvers have defiled.

missions.localised_description: The Mountains were a gift from the Old Ones: sculptures which the warmblood delvers have defiled.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The settlements of the Untamed Ones have no order! They are constructed with no thought to Geomantic alignment. Such disorder must be erased!

missions.localised_description: The settlements of the Untamed Ones have no order! They are constructed with no thought to Geomantic alignment. Such disorder must be erased!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Orc-spawn settlements are made from their bodily waste. No such thing was ever intended by any of the Old Ones!

missions.localised_description: Orc-spawn settlements are made from their bodily waste. No such thing was ever intended by any of the Old Ones!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Elf-spawn servants place their settlements beyond the bounds of their home. This must be punished.

missions.localised_description: The Elf-spawn servants place their settlements beyond the bounds of their home. This must be punished.

localised_description.last_approved_text: They have displeased the Old Ones and must pay the ultimate price!

missions.localised_description: They have displeased the Old Ones and must pay the ultimate price!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Rat-spawn thrive under the ground. Their tunnels must be flooded and their nests purged!

missions.localised_description: Rat-spawn thrive under the ground. Their tunnels must be flooded and their nests purged!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The graves and charnel pits of the Undead must be given back to the jungle!

missions.localised_description: The graves and charnel pits of the Undead must be given back to the jungle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is written on the plaques: Elf-spawn must inhabit the island of the World Pond. Nowhere else!

missions.localised_description: It is written on the plaques: Elf-spawn must inhabit the island of the World Pond. Nowhere else!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your cohorts need reliable warriors to lead them. The Saurus will answer to their own.

missions.localised_description: Your cohorts need reliable warriors to lead them. The Saurus will answer to their own.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Council of Chiefs agrees they must aid us in our great purpose.

missions.localised_description: The Council of Chiefs agrees they must aid us in our great purpose.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Skink Priest has been sent by his Revered Master; the Mage-Priest has foreseen his purpose with us.

missions.localised_description: A Skink Priest has been sent by his Revered Master; the Mage-Priest has foreseen his purpose with us.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A cave of Cold Ones has been discovered, already tamed and ready for riders. Truly, the Old Ones work in mysterious ways...

missions.localised_description: A cave of Cold Ones has been discovered, already tamed and ready for riders. Truly, the Old Ones work in mysterious ways...

localised_description.last_approved_text: More Saurus are needed, for the interlopers always return.

missions.localised_description: More Saurus are needed, for the interlopers always return.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our revered masters demand more warriors to strike from afar, like a scorpion's sudden sting!

missions.localised_description: Our revered masters demand more warriors to strike from afar, like a scorpion's sudden sting!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Hunt and herd the jungle's beasts, for they are needed for our great purpose.

missions.localised_description: Hunt and herd the jungle's beasts, for they are needed for our great purpose.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Find the pretty Man-thing, stab him good.

missions.localised_description: Find the pretty Man-thing, stab him good.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Beastman threatens Skaven. Eliminate that threat. Yes-yes.

missions.localised_description: This Beastman threatens Skaven. Eliminate that threat. Yes-yes.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An agent of Chaos frustrates us. Clan Eshin have been summoned to kill the thing.

missions.localised_description: An agent of Chaos frustrates us. Clan Eshin have been summoned to kill the thing.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Orders from Skavenblight: kill the nasty, spiky Elf-thing.

missions.localised_description: Orders from Skavenblight: kill the nasty, spiky Elf-thing.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarf-thing must die, yes-yes!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarf-thing must die, yes-yes!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Man-thing disrupts our plans, send Clan Eshin to deal with it.

missions.localised_description: This Man-thing disrupts our plans, send Clan Eshin to deal with it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Warpstone is green, but other green things are not so nice. Orc-things! Have one killed!

missions.localised_description: Warpstone is green, but other green things are not so nice. Orc-things! Have one killed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The shiny Elf-thing makes plans against us. Make a lethal plan against him!

missions.localised_description: The shiny Elf-thing makes plans against us. Make a lethal plan against him!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Sotek's filthy servant knows of our plans. It must be silenced!

missions.localised_description: Sotek's filthy servant knows of our plans. It must be silenced!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rival with longer whiskers will get the credit if he is not-not stopped. Hire Eshin, that will solve the problem…

missions.localised_description: A rival with longer whiskers will get the credit if he is not-not stopped. Hire Eshin, that will solve the problem…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dead-thing is not dead. We should make it dead. How should we ensure it stays dead? An Assassin can get it dead.

missions.localised_description: The Dead-thing is not dead. We should make it dead. How should we ensure it stays dead? An Assassin can get it dead.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Find the tree-hugger, send an Assassin to kill it - stab it!

missions.localised_description: Find the tree-hugger, send an Assassin to kill it - stab it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Expand your realm - take the Man-thing kingdom for the Horned Rat.

missions.localised_description: Expand your realm - take the Man-thing kingdom for the Horned Rat.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The land of the spiky Elf-things is ours, the Elf-things just don't know it yet-yet.

missions.localised_description: The land of the spiky Elf-things is ours, the Elf-things just don't know it yet-yet.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ancient lairs of the Dwarf-things will soon be part of the Under-Empire.

missions.localised_description: The ancient lairs of the Dwarf-things will soon be part of the Under-Empire.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Time to-to rise through the sewers, invade the cities of the Man-things!

missions.localised_description: Time to-to rise through the sewers, invade the cities of the Man-things!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Green-things are in our way. Remove them from their hovels, so we can get to-to the real valuables.

missions.localised_description: The Green-things are in our way. Remove them from their hovels, so we can get to-to the real valuables.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The homeland of the Elf-things remains disgustingly pure. Time to change that.

missions.localised_description: The homeland of the Elf-things remains disgustingly pure. Time to change that.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Reptile-things think the jungles of Lustria theirs, but this time Sotek will not-not save them!

missions.localised_description: The Reptile-things think the jungles of Lustria theirs, but this time Sotek will not-not save them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Time for the Clan to make its move, steal land off the lesser clans and look powerful in front of Council!

missions.localised_description: Time for the Clan to make its move, steal land off the lesser clans and look powerful in front of Council!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The realms of the Undead are ripe for stealing, their dead slaves are too slow to stop us!

missions.localised_description: The realms of the Undead are ripe for stealing, their dead slaves are too slow to stop us!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We have orders, rot the trees the Elf-things call home, yes-yes!

missions.localised_description: We have orders, rot the trees the Elf-things call home, yes-yes!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Council have spoken, declare war on the Man-things, good-good.

missions.localised_description: The Council have spoken, declare war on the Man-things, good-good.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We are the Children of the Horned Rat, they are the Children of Chaos. But which one is best? There is only one way to find out…

missions.localised_description: We are the Children of the Horned Rat, they are the Children of Chaos. But which one is best? There is only one way to find out…

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dark Gods send their nasty Man-things against us. We should make war!

missions.localised_description: The Dark Gods send their nasty Man-things against us. We should make war!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The spiky Elf-things steal our slaves. Those slaves are ours! There is only one recourse.

missions.localised_description: The spiky Elf-things steal our slaves. Those slaves are ours! There is only one recourse.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Time to kill lots and lots of Dwarf-things.

missions.localised_description: Time to kill lots and lots of Dwarf-things.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Orders of the Council: war in the Empire-lands, great status awaits the clan that kills the most - go-go!

missions.localised_description: Orders of the Council: war in the Empire-lands, great status awaits the clan that kills the most - go-go!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Get the Orc-things, when their back is turned!

missions.localised_description: Get the Orc-things, when their back is turned!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Vermin Lords whisper to us-us - time to fight the Elf-things. What could go wrong?

missions.localised_description: The Vermin Lords whisper to us-us - time to fight the Elf-things. What could go wrong?

localised_description.last_approved_text: The clans are ready. We fight against the Reptile-things and their Toad-thing masters, yes-yes!

missions.localised_description: The clans are ready. We fight against the Reptile-things and their Toad-thing masters, yes-yes!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Clan war is upon us-us. A good chance to be rid of rivals within and outside the clan.

missions.localised_description: Clan war is upon us-us. A good chance to be rid of rivals within and outside the clan.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Make war with Dead-things the Council orders… Why us? Clan Skerris donation to Grey Seers of many Warptokens is surely coincidence!

missions.localised_description: Make war with Dead-things the Council orders… Why us? Clan Skerris donation to Grey Seers of many Warptokens is surely coincidence!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Declare war on the Elf-things, strip bark from their trees, piss on leaves, yes-yes!

missions.localised_description: Declare war on the Elf-things, strip bark from their trees, piss on leaves, yes-yes!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Man-thing leaders mock you! Do your thralls chitter behind you too? Kill this thing, eat-eat then no one will dare laugh!

missions.localised_description: This Man-thing leaders mock you! Do your thralls chitter behind you too? Kill this thing, eat-eat then no one will dare laugh!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Hoof-thing's time has come. Make all children of the Gods know who stands tallest!

missions.localised_description: The Hoof-thing's time has come. Make all children of the Gods know who stands tallest!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Why-why do Chaos always get to take over the world? Our time! Start by killing this ever-ever-ever Champion, or the one with the blonde fur.

missions.localised_description: Why-why do Chaos always get to take over the world? Our time! Start by killing this ever-ever-ever Champion, or the one with the blonde fur.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Witch king should we fight-fight? Dwarf-thing king? No. Sparkly Elf-thing king? No-no. Spikey Elf-thing king? Yes-yes!

missions.localised_description: Witch king should we fight-fight? Dwarf-thing king? No. Sparkly Elf-thing king? No-no. Spikey Elf-thing king? Yes-yes!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarf-things have a sparkly crown that should be yours. Kill the thing that wears it, and take the crown to much adulation!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarf-things have a sparkly crown that should be yours. Kill the thing that wears it, and take the crown to much adulation!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Man-thing with his hammer or magicks. The Council say he needs dealing with… so deal with it.

missions.localised_description: The Man-thing with his hammer or magicks. The Council say he needs dealing with… so deal with it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Time for the Green-thing to die. Not because the Grey Seers order it, but because it suits your plans.

missions.localised_description: Time for the Green-thing to die. Not because the Grey Seers order it, but because it suits your plans.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Time to bring out your best dagger, go and stab that smug Elf-thing. Take its head.

missions.localised_description: Time to bring out your best dagger, go and stab that smug Elf-thing. Take its head.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are ancient things that order the rest of the Reptile-things about. Killing them will give you much status with the Lords of Decay.

missions.localised_description: There are ancient things that order the rest of the Reptile-things about. Killing them will give you much status with the Lords of Decay.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Now is your chance to further your plans - kill your rival, and the Council of Thirteen will laud you-you.

missions.localised_description: Now is your chance to further your plans - kill your rival, and the Council of Thirteen will laud you-you.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These creatures of Nagash are nothing compared to that one, and we took care of him just fine. You don't need the Fellblade. Do it now!

missions.localised_description: These creatures of Nagash are nothing compared to that one, and we took care of him just fine. You don't need the Fellblade. Do it now!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The tree hugging Elf-thing king and the angry Bark-thing must die. This is the Council's orders, do not-not fail.

missions.localised_description: The tree hugging Elf-thing king and the angry Bark-thing must die. This is the Council's orders, do not-not fail.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Shiny Elf-thing Champion frustrates us, see if fall in battle - bite its throat out! Yes-yes!

missions.localised_description: The Shiny Elf-thing Champion frustrates us, see if fall in battle - bite its throat out! Yes-yes!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Only one race is blessed with horns - the Children of the Horned Rat - the others are mere pretenders. Prove the lie by slaying one of their Champions.

missions.localised_description: Only one race is blessed with horns - the Children of the Horned Rat - the others are mere pretenders. Prove the lie by slaying one of their Champions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Metal-thing seeks to usurp our plans. Eat it, and steal its might.

missions.localised_description: This Metal-thing seeks to usurp our plans. Eat it, and steal its might.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Spiky Dark Elves are hard to kill and even more difficult to eat - lots of spikes to get stuck in throat and between teeth. Even so, it should be done.
