missions.localised_description: Grimgor Ironhide is close! If we kill that mongrel dog in battle then his so-called Waaagh! will collapse as fast as his corpse. Break the beast and watch his support wither!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are few ways to slay a Vampire, but decapitation works even on an Undead Lord as powerful as Mannfred. The Count is close, seek him out in battle - destroy him and witness his hordes literally crumble.

missions.localised_description: There are few ways to slay a Vampire, but decapitation works even on an Undead Lord as powerful as Mannfred. The Count is close, seek him out in battle - destroy him and witness his hordes literally crumble.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Chaos Gods send powerful servants against us. Some will tell you glory awaits in slaying such a Chaos Lord, but that is false. There is no glory in this act, just survival…

missions.localised_description: The Chaos Gods send powerful servants against us. Some will tell you glory awaits in slaying such a Chaos Lord, but that is false. There is no glory in this act, just survival…

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Dwarf Lord comes down from his mountains and dares to challenge us. Kill the little oaf and take his beard as a trophy!

missions.localised_description: This Dwarf Lord comes down from his mountains and dares to challenge us. Kill the little oaf and take his beard as a trophy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Noble of the Empire of some considerable rank and support, has decried the rule of Franz. He is a traitor and cannot be allowed to live or others will sense weakness.

missions.localised_description: A Noble of the Empire of some considerable rank and support, has decried the rule of Franz. He is a traitor and cannot be allowed to live or others will sense weakness.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This enemy Lord is powerful indeed. Think of the glory to be gained in killing him in battle!

missions.localised_description: This enemy Lord is powerful indeed. Think of the glory to be gained in killing him in battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Greenskin Warboss, one chosen by his foul gods is a threat to our people. We must slay the brute before his power grows even stronger.

missions.localised_description: A Greenskin Warboss, one chosen by his foul gods is a threat to our people. We must slay the brute before his power grows even stronger.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Vampire Count has arisen, one that could challenge even Mannfred - but for now the creature is a threat to the Empire. It must be slain in Sigmar's holy name.

missions.localised_description: A Vampire Count has arisen, one that could challenge even Mannfred - but for now the creature is a threat to the Empire. It must be slain in Sigmar's holy name.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The forces of Chaos come to destroy us. Engage the dread army - For Franz, for Sigmar!

missions.localised_description: The forces of Chaos come to destroy us. Engage the dread army - For Franz, for Sigmar!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarf throng readies itself to battle us. We should not disappoint the bearded fools. Show the stunted folk what men of Sigmar can do - engage!

missions.localised_description: A Dwarf throng readies itself to battle us. We should not disappoint the bearded fools. Show the stunted folk what men of Sigmar can do - engage!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is to be battle, such a waste in a world with so many other enemies. Yet Sigmar has ever-been the Warrior-God, so we must not disappoint him now - to arms!

missions.localised_description: It is to be battle, such a waste in a world with so many other enemies. Yet Sigmar has ever-been the Warrior-God, so we must not disappoint him now - to arms!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There is only war. Engage the enemy army; bring them to battle!

missions.localised_description: There is only war. Engage the enemy army; bring them to battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An Orc mob gathers. We must stop it before they ravage the land. Bring the green filth to battle!

missions.localised_description: An Orc mob gathers. We must stop it before they ravage the land. Bring the green filth to battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Chaos horde raids across our lands. It must be stopped.

missions.localised_description: A Chaos horde raids across our lands. It must be stopped.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs stomp around our lands without our leave. Such defilement cannot be ignored!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfs stomp around our lands without our leave. Such defilement cannot be ignored!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An army of a rival Elector blatantly marches through our lands unsettling the smallfolk; it is time to put a stop to this.

missions.localised_description: An army of a rival Elector blatantly marches through our lands unsettling the smallfolk; it is time to put a stop to this.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This enemy force is stomping around our lands. Let us show them that Sigmar's justice is swift!

missions.localised_description: This enemy force is stomping around our lands. Let us show them that Sigmar's justice is swift!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Orcs and Goblins raid the provinces, despoiling and befouling as they go. By the Jade Griffon, we cannot tolerate this!

missions.localised_description: Orcs and Goblins raid the provinces, despoiling and befouling as they go. By the Jade Griffon, we cannot tolerate this!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An Undead host shambles around our lands. Hunt down and destroy the Corpse-spawn!

missions.localised_description: An Undead host shambles around our lands. Hunt down and destroy the Corpse-spawn!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The puppet-master of an Undead horde seeks battle. By Morr's will we must oblige them. Send this grave filth back to the crypts!

missions.localised_description: The puppet-master of an Undead horde seeks battle. By Morr's will we must oblige them. Send this grave filth back to the crypts!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs are as uncomfortable on the sea as they are above ground. Their metal boxes are no match for our vessels. Seek them out and destroy the Dwarf fleet.

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfs are as uncomfortable on the sea as they are above ground. Their metal boxes are no match for our vessels. Seek them out and destroy the Dwarf fleet.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The traitor fleet must be destroyed, send them to the depths and Stromfel's embrace!

missions.localised_description: The traitor fleet must be destroyed, send them to the depths and Stromfel's embrace!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The enemy fleet is close, a worthy sacrifice to the Sea God, Manann. Seek them out!

missions.localised_description: The enemy fleet is close, a worthy sacrifice to the Sea God, Manann. Seek them out!

localised_description.last_approved_text: That the Orcs have an actual naval force is one of the great mysteries only the Gods themselves can unravel. That the Greenskins seek to fight with it is another. Find this ramshackle collection of 'ships' and sink them!

missions.localised_description: That the Orcs have an actual naval force is one of the great mysteries only the Gods themselves can unravel. That the Greenskins seek to fight with it is another. Find this ramshackle collection of 'ships' and sink them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Despite Sylvania's land-locked nature, there have been several infamous Vampire 'admirals' - Count Noctilus and Luther Harkon being two… And now a Dreadfleet sails the seas again. Find it and destroy!

missions.localised_description: Despite Sylvania's land-locked nature, there have been several infamous Vampire 'admirals' - Count Noctilus and Luther Harkon being two… And now a Dreadfleet sails the seas again. Find it and destroy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The race of men know many enemies. By allying with our kin, we may stand a better chance at survival against dark forces of destruction.

missions.localised_description: The race of men know many enemies. By allying with our kin, we may stand a better chance at survival against dark forces of destruction.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The greed of the Dwarfs is legendary, taking valuables and jealously hoarding them under the ground. This region is said to contain some lost Dwarfen vaults, send forth dungeoneers to search for them!

missions.localised_description: The greed of the Dwarfs is legendary, taking valuables and jealously hoarding them under the ground. This region is said to contain some lost Dwarfen vaults, send forth dungeoneers to search for them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This region of the Empire has been forsaken by Sigmar, so says Volkmar the Grim. It is ripe for plunder.

missions.localised_description: This region of the Empire has been forsaken by Sigmar, so says Volkmar the Grim. It is ripe for plunder.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This region is ripe for plunder. Send forth forces to reap their lands!

missions.localised_description: This region is ripe for plunder. Send forth forces to reap their lands!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This region, held by the Orcs, may turn up valuables and plunder missed by the Greenskins whose interests lie in violence rather than riches.

missions.localised_description: This region, held by the Orcs, may turn up valuables and plunder missed by the Greenskins whose interests lie in violence rather than riches.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Undead realm hides many great secrets and relics of value - items of gold and other baubles that no longer interest immortals. Send forth forces to scour the lands.

missions.localised_description: This Undead realm hides many great secrets and relics of value - items of gold and other baubles that no longer interest immortals. Send forth forces to scour the lands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the Empire grows, so too does the need to raise additional forces to protect our borders and expand further. We should raise an army.

missions.localised_description: As the Empire grows, so too does the need to raise additional forces to protect our borders and expand further. We should raise an army.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The seas that surround the Old World need to be controlled as much as the land. Raise a fleet worthy of the Heldenhammer to protect our naval interests and bring ruin to our enemies.

missions.localised_description: The seas that surround the Old World need to be controlled as much as the land. Raise a fleet worthy of the Heldenhammer to protect our naval interests and bring ruin to our enemies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Dwarfen settlement is an affront to Sigmar! Reap what you can from it; if you see fit, put it to the torch as well!

missions.localised_description: This Dwarfen settlement is an affront to Sigmar! Reap what you can from it; if you see fit, put it to the torch as well!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This settlement is home to the enemies of the Emperor. Take anything of value and then put it to the torch!

missions.localised_description: This settlement is home to the enemies of the Emperor. Take anything of value and then put it to the torch!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This settlement is a blight on the world. Cleanse it in holy fire after you have taken anything of value.

missions.localised_description: This settlement is a blight on the world. Cleanse it in holy fire after you have taken anything of value.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These vile Orc hovels are an affront to Sigmar! See if there is anything worth taking and then purge it in flame, should you so wish.

missions.localised_description: These vile Orc hovels are an affront to Sigmar! See if there is anything worth taking and then purge it in flame, should you so wish.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Vampire nest is an unholy blight on the world. Send in the Witch Hunters so they may confiscate the abominable relics and then put the foul place to the torch!

missions.localised_description: This Vampire nest is an unholy blight on the world. Send in the Witch Hunters so they may confiscate the abominable relics and then put the foul place to the torch!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Captain of the Empire - a warrior from the noble classes - will be able to bring discipline and martial prowess to our forces. We should recruit one at the first opportunity!

missions.localised_description: A Captain of the Empire - a warrior from the noble classes - will be able to bring discipline and martial prowess to our forces. We should recruit one at the first opportunity!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Warrior Priest is needed in our force to embolden the men and bring his righteous might to the many battles we will have to fight.

missions.localised_description: A Warrior Priest is needed in our force to embolden the men and bring his righteous might to the many battles we will have to fight.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An agent of the Order of the Silver Hammer - more commonly known as Witch Hunter - is needed. His unique skills will give us a clear advantage in the battles to come.

missions.localised_description: An agent of the Order of the Silver Hammer - more commonly known as Witch Hunter - is needed. His unique skills will give us a clear advantage in the battles to come.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not since before Magnus as the Empire been without enchanters to protect and serve our nation's interests. We should recruit an adept - a Battle Wizard - from the Colleges of Magic.

missions.localised_description: Not since before Magnus as the Empire been without enchanters to protect and serve our nation's interests. We should recruit an adept - a Battle Wizard - from the Colleges of Magic.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs can try, but no one under Sigmar's sun can match the range and accuracy of the Imperial Gunners. Bring the artillery to bear; let it speak for itself!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfs can try, but no one under Sigmar's sun can match the range and accuracy of the Imperial Gunners. Bring the artillery to bear; let it speak for itself!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We care not what the Bretonnians claim, it is the Empire that is blessed with the best cavalry in the Old World! We should recruit such regiments now.

missions.localised_description: We care not what the Bretonnians claim, it is the Empire that is blessed with the best cavalry in the Old World! We should recruit such regiments now.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The highly-trained State Troops cannot be beaten by savages or even the axe-obsessed Dwarfs. Individually, they may not the greatest of fighters, but as regiments, the Empire has the best troops. Start recruiting!

missions.localised_description: The highly-trained State Troops cannot be beaten by savages or even the axe-obsessed Dwarfs. Individually, they may not the greatest of fighters, but as regiments, the Empire has the best troops. Start recruiting!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The missile troops of the Empire are like no other, armed with black powder or more traditional crossbow weapons. We should bring some into our armies.

missions.localised_description: The missile troops of the Empire are like no other, armed with black powder or more traditional crossbow weapons. We should bring some into our armies.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The menageries of the Empire contain many fantastical beasts that brave - or foolish - riders can guide into battle. Now is the time to see such magnificent creatures!

missions.localised_description: The menageries of the Empire contain many fantastical beasts that brave - or foolish - riders can guide into battle. Now is the time to see such magnificent creatures!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Empire war machines have long since surpassed those of the Dwarfs that are moribund in pointless traditionalism. The Empire innovates! Bring these machines of war to the battlefield.

missions.localised_description: Empire war machines have long since surpassed those of the Dwarfs that are moribund in pointless traditionalism. The Empire innovates! Bring these machines of war to the battlefield.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A servant of the Dark Powers could be a threat to your growing power, grab your choppa and bring this metal-clad fool down.

missions.localised_description: A servant of the Dark Powers could be a threat to your growing power, grab your choppa and bring this metal-clad fool down.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the Dwarfs love their dead ancestors so much, send them to meet their rotting kin! There is one of the bearded-gits mocking you - make him the first to die!

missions.localised_description: If the Dwarfs love their dead ancestors so much, send them to meet their rotting kin! There is one of the bearded-gits mocking you - make him the first to die!

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of the Empire's agents could be a thorn in our side. Stomp on him good.

missions.localised_description: One of the Empire's agents could be a thorn in our side. Stomp on him good.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We need to kill this foe, or he'll become a threat to your dominance.

missions.localised_description: We need to kill this foe, or he'll become a threat to your dominance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We need to kill this foe, or she'll become a threat to your dominance.

missions.localised_description: We need to kill this foe, or she'll become a threat to your dominance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Another Greenskin dares to challenge us! End him.

missions.localised_description: Another Greenskin dares to challenge us! End him.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An agent of the Undead stalks you. Best to seek him out and rip off the wretch's head - let us see if he can rise back up then!

missions.localised_description: An agent of the Undead stalks you. Best to seek him out and rip off the wretch's head - let us see if he can rise back up then!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An agent of the Undead stalks you. Best to seek her out and rip off the wretch's head - let us see if she can rise back up then!

missions.localised_description: An agent of the Undead stalks you. Best to seek her out and rip off the wretch's head - let us see if she can rise back up then!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Chaos Lord needs to die. Take your choppa and slaughter him, only then will your Green Godz smile on us.

missions.localised_description: The Chaos Lord needs to die. Take your choppa and slaughter him, only then will your Green Godz smile on us.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarf Lord mocks you. He needs to die, or your loyal boyz will wonder if you are the leader for them.

missions.localised_description: The Dwarf Lord mocks you. He needs to die, or your loyal boyz will wonder if you are the leader for them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The humies of the Empire are getting cocky, they need a good 'slap' - especially this one Lord. Kill him and watch the rest shirk back to their cities.

missions.localised_description: The humies of the Empire are getting cocky, they need a good 'slap' - especially this one Lord. Kill him and watch the rest shirk back to their cities.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The enemy Lord has his eyes on you, he thinks to topple us. Better strike first. Kill him and watch his support fall.

missions.localised_description: The enemy Lord has his eyes on you, he thinks to topple us. Better strike first. Kill him and watch his support fall.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An Orc Warlord wants your position. Hunt the fool down and slaughter him in front of his boyz.

missions.localised_description: An Orc Warlord wants your position. Hunt the fool down and slaughter him in front of his boyz.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Vampire is already dead, but his corpse refuses to acknowledge it! You should go and persuade this creature that a corpse should no longer move - destroy it!

missions.localised_description: This Vampire is already dead, but his corpse refuses to acknowledge it! You should go and persuade this creature that a corpse should no longer move - destroy it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is time to expand your realms, Mork demands it! Take another region off the stunties, make them scrawl another wrong in their petty little book!

missions.localised_description: It is time to expand your realms, Mork demands it! Take another region off the stunties, make them scrawl another wrong in their petty little book!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This stronghold is dominated by a rival Warboss, take it from him! Let the other wretches know the power of the boyz!

missions.localised_description: This stronghold is dominated by a rival Warboss, take it from him! Let the other wretches know the power of the boyz!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Black Crag has been taken! The boyz will falter if they think we cannot control our own stronghold. Get it back!

missions.localised_description: Black Crag has been taken! The boyz will falter if they think we cannot control our own stronghold. Get it back!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your ancient enemies think to bring back their petty empire. Declare war! Show them their age is done - now is the time of the Orc!

missions.localised_description: Your ancient enemies think to bring back their petty empire. Declare war! Show them their age is done - now is the time of the Orc!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time of men is over, begin the Waaagh! Ravage the lands, Mork demands that the green tide rises - declare war!

missions.localised_description: The time of men is over, begin the Waaagh! Ravage the lands, Mork demands that the green tide rises - declare war!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not all the boyz want to be dominated. The fools! Teach them the error of their ways, make them pay for defying us! Declare war!

missions.localised_description: Not all the boyz want to be dominated. The fools! Teach them the error of their ways, make them pay for defying us! Declare war!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Time for the Vampires and their shambling hordes to feel the might of the Greenskins. Declare war!

missions.localised_description: Time for the Vampires and their shambling hordes to feel the might of the Greenskins. Declare war!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Boyz from another tribe have asked for a 'favour'. If you slay the git bothering them, then they may well swear allegiance.

missions.localised_description: Boyz from another tribe have asked for a 'favour'. If you slay the git bothering them, then they may well swear allegiance.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Greenskins of another tribe have begged us to take their enemy's territory, swearing fealty if we succeed.

missions.localised_description: The Greenskins of another tribe have begged us to take their enemy's territory, swearing fealty if we succeed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our potential allies have a task for us, if we can bring down their enemy's champion in battle then they may be inclined to Waaagh! with us. It's a good deal!

missions.localised_description: Our potential allies have a task for us, if we can bring down their enemy's champion in battle then they may be inclined to Waaagh! with us. It's a good deal!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Some boyz want us to fight their enemy. Do this and we will increase our chances of bringing them entirely under our rule.

missions.localised_description: Some boyz want us to fight their enemy. Do this and we will increase our chances of bringing them entirely under our rule.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rival tribe and potential ally have asked your boyz to go raiding on enemy lands. The spoils will be ours, of course, and it will be seen favourably by these boyz - allowing us to dominate them soon!

missions.localised_description: A rival tribe and potential ally have asked your boyz to go raiding on enemy lands. The spoils will be ours, of course, and it will be seen favourably by these boyz - allowing us to dominate them soon!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your Greenskin mates have requested that we wreak havoc upon their enemy by ransacking their lands. Do this and we will increase our chances of bringing these boyz entirely under our domination!

missions.localised_description: Your Greenskin mates have requested that we wreak havoc upon their enemy by ransacking their lands. Do this and we will increase our chances of bringing these boyz entirely under our domination!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Archaon proclaims himself the ultimate destroyer, that is our savage Lord's role! Hunt down this spiky-clad pretender and his pitiful army - destroy them all!

missions.localised_description: This Archaon proclaims himself the ultimate destroyer, that is our savage Lord's role! Hunt down this spiky-clad pretender and his pitiful army - destroy them all!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarf Boss - king of the stunties - is close. Go and find his mates, kill them and take the Dwarf's crown. That will be something to write in their precious book alright!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarf Boss - king of the stunties - is close. Go and find his mates, kill them and take the Dwarf's crown. That will be something to write in their precious book alright!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Emperor is close. He leads his personal army out - a foolish move that our Boss should take advantage of. Kill Karl Franz in battle and watch the humie scum quail!

missions.localised_description: The Emperor is close. He leads his personal army out - a foolish move that our Boss should take advantage of. Kill Karl Franz in battle and watch the humie scum quail!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The enemy is leading his army through nearby lands. Kill him - take his head for the boss pole and we will strike a terrible blow against our foes!

missions.localised_description: The enemy is leading his army through nearby lands. Kill him - take his head for the boss pole and we will strike a terrible blow against our foes!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Grimgor challenges us, and he is close. Bring this pretender to his knees and then knock out his teef, and take his boyz!

missions.localised_description: Grimgor challenges us, and he is close. Bring this pretender to his knees and then knock out his teef, and take his boyz!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Blood Sucking corpse known as Mannfred is near. He leads an army of bones within brawling distance. Bring the cadaver to battle and kill him - again!

missions.localised_description: The Blood Sucking corpse known as Mannfred is near. He leads an army of bones within brawling distance. Bring the cadaver to battle and kill him - again!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dark Gods send their champion forth and he is powerful indeed. His head on your boss pole would bring more boyz to our banner. Go and slay the Chaos Lord - take his glory for your own!

missions.localised_description: The Dark Gods send their champion forth and he is powerful indeed. His head on your boss pole would bring more boyz to our banner. Go and slay the Chaos Lord - take his glory for your own!

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of the Stunty gits has gotten too big for his beard. Find this 'Lord' and bring him down. Make the git even shorter by a head than he is now…

missions.localised_description: One of the Stunty gits has gotten too big for his beard. Find this 'Lord' and bring him down. Make the git even shorter by a head than he is now…

localised_description.last_approved_text: An Empire noble is on the rise, some even call him 'Orc-Slayer'. Best to find this git and show him what a 'humie slayer' can do.

missions.localised_description: An Empire noble is on the rise, some even call him 'Orc-Slayer'. Best to find this git and show him what a 'humie slayer' can do.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An enemy Lord grows in power. A choppa to the face will cut him down to size!

missions.localised_description: An enemy Lord grows in power. A choppa to the face will cut him down to size!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rival Warboss has been causing trouble amongst the tribes. See that he doesn't cause anymore!

missions.localised_description: A rival Warboss has been causing trouble amongst the tribes. See that he doesn't cause anymore!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Undead stalk the lands and a Vampire Lord rises in power; that could threaten us. Seek out the corpse-creature and take a choppa to its neck!

missions.localised_description: The Undead stalk the lands and a Vampire Lord rises in power; that could threaten us. Seek out the corpse-creature and take a choppa to its neck!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Chaos army shall fall before the might of our boyz. Smash the spiky metal gits!

missions.localised_description: The Chaos army shall fall before the might of our boyz. Smash the spiky metal gits!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs send a throng against us. Seek them out and fight!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfs send a throng against us. Seek them out and fight!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Empire seeks out our mobs and readies for battle, it would be un-Orcy to shun such a scrap!

missions.localised_description: The Empire seeks out our mobs and readies for battle, it would be un-Orcy to shun such a scrap!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The foe comes - an army calling us out. For Mork's sake, engage the army - bring these gits to battle!

missions.localised_description: The foe comes - an army calling us out. For Mork's sake, engage the army - bring these gits to battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Orcs come! These Greenskins are our enemies - it is time to fight!

missions.localised_description: Orcs come! These Greenskins are our enemies - it is time to fight!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Chaos filth roam across lands proclaimed by Gork and Mork, kick them out!

missions.localised_description: The Chaos filth roam across lands proclaimed by Gork and Mork, kick them out!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs invade tribal lands. How dare they! Get rid of the stunties!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfs invade tribal lands. How dare they! Get rid of the stunties!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Karl Franz sends his men to take Greenskin lands from our tribes. It's time to fight!

missions.localised_description: Karl Franz sends his men to take Greenskin lands from our tribes. It's time to fight!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The enemy raid our lands. They raid OUR lands! Find these gits and get them good!

missions.localised_description: The enemy raid our lands. They raid OUR lands! Find these gits and get them good!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rival tribe roves through our region, raiding and plundering. Find the invaders and make them pay.

missions.localised_description: A rival tribe roves through our region, raiding and plundering. Find the invaders and make them pay.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An Undead army shambles through our lands, taking stuff - get them!

missions.localised_description: An Undead army shambles through our lands, taking stuff - get them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Undead host stands ready for battle. Be it Blood Sucka or Necromancer, we must teach these corpses a lesson - not to mess with living, breathing Orcs!

missions.localised_description: This Undead host stands ready for battle. Be it Blood Sucka or Necromancer, we must teach these corpses a lesson - not to mess with living, breathing Orcs!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Stunties steam across the oceans in big metal cans. Open up their metal hulls and let the sea do the rest!

missions.localised_description: The Stunties steam across the oceans in big metal cans. Open up their metal hulls and let the sea do the rest!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Empire ships are drift wood - they just don't know it yet!

missions.localised_description: The Empire ships are drift wood - they just don't know it yet!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The enemy fleet is no match for the hulks of the Orcs, send the gits to the sea bed!

missions.localised_description: The enemy fleet is no match for the hulks of the Orcs, send the gits to the sea bed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rival fleet of Orc ships dares to challenge us upon the water - show them that choppas work on the sea just as well as dry land.

missions.localised_description: A rival fleet of Orc ships dares to challenge us upon the water - show them that choppas work on the sea just as well as dry land.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Vampire Counts think their ramshackle boats are better than our ramshackle boats. Prove them wrong!

missions.localised_description: The Vampire Counts think their ramshackle boats are better than our ramshackle boats. Prove them wrong!

localised_description.last_approved_text: There are many gits to crush. Make an alliance with fellow Greenskins and you can destroy the other races together.

missions.localised_description: There are many gits to crush. Make an alliance with fellow Greenskins and you can destroy the other races together.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Stealing from the Dwarfs really winds them up! Let's loot their lands and really get their beards in a twist.

missions.localised_description: Stealing from the Dwarfs really winds them up! Let's loot their lands and really get their beards in a twist.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Imperial region is ripe for plunder. Send in the scavengers and pick it clean!

missions.localised_description: This Imperial region is ripe for plunder. Send in the scavengers and pick it clean!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This region is ripe for plunder. Send forth forces to reap their lands - Gork demands it!

missions.localised_description: This region is ripe for plunder. Send forth forces to reap their lands - Gork demands it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This land is yet to become green - loot it and take anything shiny!

missions.localised_description: This land is yet to become green - loot it and take anything shiny!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Raid the Vampire lands, knock over a few graves and steal from the tombs. That is the Greenskin way.

missions.localised_description: Raid the Vampire lands, knock over a few graves and steal from the tombs. That is the Greenskin way.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As the Waaagh! grows additional boyz can be summoned. Send out the call, bring fresh mobs to our totem.

missions.localised_description: As the Waaagh! grows additional boyz can be summoned. Send out the call, bring fresh mobs to our totem.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We need to bash a few hulks together and get some of the boyz on the sea. It's not the best place for an Orc, but we can't let our enemies control the oceans.

missions.localised_description: We need to bash a few hulks together and get some of the boyz on the sea. It's not the best place for an Orc, but we can't let our enemies control the oceans.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This stunty barrow needs smashing! Take any shiny stuff and then burn it!

missions.localised_description: This stunty barrow needs smashing! Take any shiny stuff and then burn it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This settlement of man must be destroyed - Mork commands it! Reap what you can and then bring fire!

missions.localised_description: This settlement of man must be destroyed - Mork commands it! Reap what you can and then bring fire!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This settlement must be broken as if by Gork's Fists. Put it to the torch but only after you have taken all its valuables for the Boss' shiny pile.

missions.localised_description: This settlement must be broken as if by Gork's Fists. Put it to the torch but only after you have taken all its valuables for the Boss' shiny pile.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Greenskin encampment should be ransacked and burnt in Gork's (or Mork's) name. Do it!

missions.localised_description: This Greenskin encampment should be ransacked and burnt in Gork's (or Mork's) name. Do it!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Vampires have their filthy nests everywhere. This one should be raided; steal all the shiny stuff and then - if you want, and you probably do - burn it to the ground!

missions.localised_description: The Vampires have their filthy nests everywhere. This one should be raided; steal all the shiny stuff and then - if you want, and you probably do - burn it to the ground!

localised_description.last_approved_text: You need a Goblin to talk to other Goblins. Well, whether that true or not, recruiting a Goblin Big Boss is a good idea!

missions.localised_description: You need a Goblin to talk to other Goblins. Well, whether that true or not, recruiting a Goblin Big Boss is a good idea!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Shaman is needed to give your mobs a bit of arcane poke. Recruit one - Goblin or Orc it doesn't matter… yet.

missions.localised_description: A Shaman is needed to give your mobs a bit of arcane poke. Recruit one - Goblin or Orc it doesn't matter… yet.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Greenskin barrage is about throwing lots of big rocks at the same time. Crude but effective. Let's organise it.

missions.localised_description: A Greenskin barrage is about throwing lots of big rocks at the same time. Crude but effective. Let's organise it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Greenskin cavalry can be fast and brutal. We should get some mobs of cavalry in, they will make your armies more powerful.

missions.localised_description: Greenskin cavalry can be fast and brutal. We should get some mobs of cavalry in, they will make your armies more powerful.

localised_description.last_approved_text: More boyz means more choppas. That’s a good thing… Get some more!

missions.localised_description: More boyz means more choppas. That’s a good thing… Get some more!

localised_description.last_approved_text: It doesn't always have to be about getting up close with your choppas. Hitting the gits from afar can work well too. We should recruit some missile mobs.

missions.localised_description: It doesn't always have to be about getting up close with your choppas. Hitting the gits from afar can work well too. We should recruit some missile mobs.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The monstrous pets of the Greenskins will terrify and munch through any army, Get some!

missions.localised_description: The monstrous pets of the Greenskins will terrify and munch through any army, Get some!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Greenskin war machines are the best - maybe - I recommend starting construction!

missions.localised_description: Greenskin war machines are the best - maybe - I recommend starting construction!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This mortal vessel reveres the Dark Gods, he is a pawn of our enemies and a risk to our own plans. Kill him.

missions.localised_description: This mortal vessel reveres the Dark Gods, he is a pawn of our enemies and a risk to our own plans. Kill him.

localised_description.last_approved_text: One of Grudgebearer's peons is a threat. Send him to an early grave so the stunted fool may be risen to serve us.

missions.localised_description: One of Grudgebearer's peons is a threat. Send him to an early grave so the stunted fool may be risen to serve us.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A dog of Franz comes lolloping into our sights. It is loyal to its master and believes it can do you harm. Put the mongrel out of its misery!

missions.localised_description: A dog of Franz comes lolloping into our sights. It is loyal to its master and believes it can do you harm. Put the mongrel out of its misery!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This agent of the foe is hostile to our goals. Sever his head from his shoulders, and the threat will go away.

missions.localised_description: This agent of the foe is hostile to our goals. Sever his head from his shoulders, and the threat will go away.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This agent of the foe is hostile to our goals. Sever her head from her shoulders, and the threat will go away.

missions.localised_description: This agent of the foe is hostile to our goals. Sever her head from her shoulders, and the threat will go away.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Greenskins send their brutes to frustrate and annoy our plans. Obliterate it, like you would any pest!

missions.localised_description: The Greenskins send their brutes to frustrate and annoy our plans. Obliterate it, like you would any pest!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Another practitioner of Dark Magic seeks to unseat us. Send this amateur's pet back in a coffin!

missions.localised_description: Another practitioner of Dark Magic seeks to unseat us. Send this amateur's pet back in a coffin!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Another practitioner of Dark Magic seeks to unseat us. Send this amateur's pet back in a coffin!

missions.localised_description: Another practitioner of Dark Magic seeks to unseat us. Send this amateur's pet back in a coffin!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Chaos Lord, one of the Ruinous Powers' primary servants is a threat to our goals. Silence him!

missions.localised_description: This Chaos Lord, one of the Ruinous Powers' primary servants is a threat to our goals. Silence him!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Lord of the stunted seeks to ruin us. Ruin him instead!

missions.localised_description: A Lord of the stunted seeks to ruin us. Ruin him instead!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Karl Franz dares to send his minions to threaten us. Kill the mortal and send a message to the usurper!

missions.localised_description: Karl Franz dares to send his minions to threaten us. Kill the mortal and send a message to the usurper!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Seek out this enemy Lord and make the mortal fool regret crossing the Vampire Counts!

missions.localised_description: Seek out this enemy Lord and make the mortal fool regret crossing the Vampire Counts!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Orcs dare to send a Warboss against us. It is a beast, and should be dealt with like any unwanted pest. Kill it.

missions.localised_description: The Orcs dare to send a Warboss against us. It is a beast, and should be dealt with like any unwanted pest. Kill it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Another Vampire, one of our own bloodline, seeks domination over us. Seek out your kin and send him back to the crypt.

missions.localised_description: Another Vampire, one of our own bloodline, seeks domination over us. Seek out your kin and send him back to the crypt.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This settlement of mortals should belong to us. We care not for Morr's tenets - conquer it at the first opportunity!

missions.localised_description: This settlement of mortals should belong to us. We care not for Morr's tenets - conquer it at the first opportunity!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Undead require this settlement. Send forth our legions to take it.

missions.localised_description: The Undead require this settlement. Send forth our legions to take it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The von Carsteins ancestral castle has been taken! It must be returned to Mannfred's hands.

missions.localised_description: The von Carsteins ancestral castle has been taken! It must be returned to Mannfred's hands.

localised_description.last_approved_text: These lands are ours by rights older than Sigmar himself! Claim them in the von Carstein name.

missions.localised_description: These lands are ours by rights older than Sigmar himself! Claim them in the von Carstein name.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It is Hel Fenn all over again! This time the Vampire Counts will be victorious - declare war on the Dwarfs!

missions.localised_description: It is Hel Fenn all over again! This time the Vampire Counts will be victorious - declare war on the Dwarfs!

localised_description.last_approved_text: We have warred with the mortal usurpers of the Empire many times before; now we will teach them a final lesson!

missions.localised_description: We have warred with the mortal usurpers of the Empire many times before; now we will teach them a final lesson!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Too long have we suffered these Greenskins to live. The time has come to march to war, wipe these base creatures off the map!

missions.localised_description: Too long have we suffered these Greenskins to live. The time has come to march to war, wipe these base creatures off the map!

localised_description.last_approved_text: For too long have we suffered these thralls to parasitically exist on our triumphs. No longer! Destroy these pretenders, there is only one von Carstein!

missions.localised_description: For too long have we suffered these thralls to parasitically exist on our triumphs. No longer! Destroy these pretenders, there is only one von Carstein!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our brethren have requested that we dispose of their enemy's greatest warrior, and will swear fealty if we succeed. Do this and we will increase our chances of bringing all Vampire Counts entirely under our will.

missions.localised_description: Our brethren have requested that we dispose of their enemy's greatest warrior, and will swear fealty if we succeed. Do this and we will increase our chances of bringing all Vampire Counts entirely under our will.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Another of our bloodline has requested that we weaken a mortal's position by seizing the enemy region. Should we do this, our sibling will swear fealty, or so they say.

missions.localised_description: Another of our bloodline has requested that we weaken a mortal's position by seizing the enemy region. Should we do this, our sibling will swear fealty, or so they say.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our kin request that we strike a blow to their enemy by slaying their greatest mortal fighter in battle. Do this and they will be more susceptible to our dominion!

missions.localised_description: Our kin request that we strike a blow to their enemy by slaying their greatest mortal fighter in battle. Do this and they will be more susceptible to our dominion!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Another Count has approached us; we must engage an enemy force that plagues them. If we do this, then we can manipulate them into our fealty.

missions.localised_description: Another Count has approached us; we must engage an enemy force that plagues them. If we do this, then we can manipulate them into our fealty.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Your brothers in death have requested that we sabotage their enemy's war efforts by raiding their supplies. Should we do this, they will owe us!

missions.localised_description: Your brothers in death have requested that we sabotage their enemy's war efforts by raiding their supplies. Should we do this, they will owe us!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our Undead brethren ask that we wreak havoc upon their foe by ransacking their lands. Bring the blight to this mortal enemy and our brothers may side with us, allowing the Midnight Aristocracy to ascend!

missions.localised_description: Our Undead brethren ask that we wreak havoc upon their foe by ransacking their lands. Bring the blight to this mortal enemy and our brothers may side with us, allowing the Midnight Aristocracy to ascend!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Does the Ruinous Power's chosen pet, think to threaten us? What does he know of immortality? He and his armies are close, find and kill this pretender.

missions.localised_description: Does the Ruinous Power's chosen pet, think to threaten us? What does he know of immortality? He and his armies are close, find and kill this pretender.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs have always been threat. Now their High King marches close with his stunted throng. Hunt down their sovereign and slay him.

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfs have always been threat. Now their High King marches close with his stunted throng. Hunt down their sovereign and slay him.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The false Emperor is close! Karl Franz is near, accompanied by his cattle. Let us find him and slay the fool, leaving the throne for us!

missions.localised_description: The false Emperor is close! Karl Franz is near, accompanied by his cattle. Let us find him and slay the fool, leaving the throne for us!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An enemy is so close, you can taste it! Hunt down this fool and his entourage - show him the power of the Undead!

missions.localised_description: An enemy is so close, you can taste it! Hunt down this fool and his entourage - show him the power of the Undead!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The beast, Ironhide, is close. Hunt down this Orc's army, meet the creature in battle and bring its end.

missions.localised_description: The beast, Ironhide, is close. Hunt down this Orc's army, meet the creature in battle and bring its end.

localised_description.last_approved_text: He challenges us. But there is only one, count… one Lord of the Night… and that is you! Find this pretender for he is close and skulking within his host. End him!

missions.localised_description: He challenges us. But there is only one, count… one Lord of the Night… and that is you! Find this pretender for he is close and skulking within his host. End him!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Chaos Lord holds great power. Nagash would see such a foe and end them - so should we.

missions.localised_description: This Chaos Lord holds great power. Nagash would see such a foe and end them - so should we.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarf Lord challenges us. There is much glory in silencing such challengers.

missions.localised_description: A Dwarf Lord challenges us. There is much glory in silencing such challengers.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Empire Lord grows in power. To kill and rise him up as a zombie servant would be very satisfying indeed.

missions.localised_description: This Empire Lord grows in power. To kill and rise him up as a zombie servant would be very satisfying indeed.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This enemy Lord is powerful indeed. Think of the glory to be gained in killing him in battle!

missions.localised_description: This enemy Lord is powerful indeed. Think of the glory to be gained in killing him in battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Greenskin Warboss rises in power and could one day even challenge the Midnight Aristocracy! Take the beast's head as a trophy!

missions.localised_description: A Greenskin Warboss rises in power and could one day even challenge the Midnight Aristocracy! Take the beast's head as a trophy!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Another of Vlad's progeny emerges and thinks to challenge our dominion. Take it's head and show the world who is the one true von Carstein.

missions.localised_description: Another of Vlad's progeny emerges and thinks to challenge our dominion. Take it's head and show the world who is the one true von Carstein.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Chaos think to take this world - but it's ours to reap! Engage this Chaos army in battle!

missions.localised_description: Chaos think to take this world - but it's ours to reap! Engage this Chaos army in battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Dwarf army has been lured into our trap. Now finish the job and bring the bearded-scum to battle!

missions.localised_description: A Dwarf army has been lured into our trap. Now finish the job and bring the bearded-scum to battle!

localised_description.last_approved_text: An Empire army comes, engage the mortal fools in combat and think of the corpses that shall refresh our ranks in battle's wake.

missions.localised_description: An Empire army comes, engage the mortal fools in combat and think of the corpses that shall refresh our ranks in battle's wake.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This enemy army shall fall before the might of our Undead warriors. Make them dead.

missions.localised_description: This enemy army shall fall before the might of our Undead warriors. Make them dead.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Greenskin may love war but they are no match for our Undead minions. Bring the Orc-filth to battle and teach them what immortality is!

missions.localised_description: The Greenskin may love war but they are no match for our Undead minions. Bring the Orc-filth to battle and teach them what immortality is!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Ruinous Powers dare to set foot in lands claimed by von Carstein. Get the invaders, show them a new god - show them death!

missions.localised_description: The Ruinous Powers dare to set foot in lands claimed by von Carstein. Get the invaders, show them a new god - show them death!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Dwarfs send their stunted kin to our lands in some foolish notion to steal our territory. They are not welcome here - eject the living from our lands!

missions.localised_description: The Dwarfs send their stunted kin to our lands in some foolish notion to steal our territory. They are not welcome here - eject the living from our lands!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Empire claim these lands as their own… They are trespassers! Invaders! See them destroyed!

missions.localised_description: The Empire claim these lands as their own… They are trespassers! Invaders! See them destroyed!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This enemy force is stomping around our lands. Show them the darkness of the grave!

missions.localised_description: This enemy force is stomping around our lands. Show them the darkness of the grave!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Orcs invade our lands. Find them, steal their breath and make them dead!

missions.localised_description: The Orcs invade our lands. Find them, steal their breath and make them dead!

localised_description.last_approved_text: A rival stalks our lands at the head of an Undead host. We must show him who the true ruler of the night is!

missions.localised_description: A rival stalks our lands at the head of an Undead host. We must show him who the true ruler of the night is!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This enemy Vampire army shall fall before the might of our unholy host. Tread them into dust!

missions.localised_description: This enemy Vampire army shall fall before the might of our unholy host. Tread them into dust!

localised_description.last_approved_text: These mountain pigs have no place on the dread oceans. Sink their metal boats!

missions.localised_description: These mountain pigs have no place on the dread oceans. Sink their metal boats!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The ships of the Elector Counts are no match for our Dreadfleet. Seek out the Imperial ships and sink them.

missions.localised_description: The ships of the Elector Counts are no match for our Dreadfleet. Seek out the Imperial ships and sink them.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Make this enemy fleet nothing more than a sorry collection of ghost ships!

missions.localised_description: Make this enemy fleet nothing more than a sorry collection of ghost ships!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Hunt down the Greenskin vessels that dare to stay afloat, send them down to the icy depths.

missions.localised_description: Hunt down the Greenskin vessels that dare to stay afloat, send them down to the icy depths.

localised_description.last_approved_text: An enemy Vampire fleet is no match for our mighty ships of bone and blood. Send the pretender's vessels to the depths.

missions.localised_description: An enemy Vampire fleet is no match for our mighty ships of bone and blood. Send the pretender's vessels to the depths.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Dwarfen region is ripe for harvesting. Send forth our legions to reap their lands!

missions.localised_description: This Dwarfen region is ripe for harvesting. Send forth our legions to reap their lands!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This region of the Empire sits stagnant and rotting like an ageing corpse. Sack it and dispose of the remains.

missions.localised_description: This region of the Empire sits stagnant and rotting like an ageing corpse. Sack it and dispose of the remains.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Like a rotting corpse, this region is ripe for plunder. Send forth forces to reap their lands!

missions.localised_description: Like a rotting corpse, this region is ripe for plunder. Send forth forces to reap their lands!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This region claimed by the Greenskins is ripe for harvest. Send our legions forth to do this.

missions.localised_description: This region claimed by the Greenskins is ripe for harvest. Send our legions forth to do this.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Undead region should be searched, and anything of value brought to us. Send out your forces.

missions.localised_description: This Undead region should be searched, and anything of value brought to us. Send out your forces.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As our eternal empire grows, so too, does the need to raise additional forces to protect our borders and expand further. We should raise an Undead host.

missions.localised_description: As our eternal empire grows, so too, does the need to raise additional forces to protect our borders and expand further. We should raise an Undead host.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Sea is not Manann's domain, but the dead's. Send forth the Ghost Ships - raise the Dreadfleet.

missions.localised_description: The Sea is not Manann's domain, but the dead's. Send forth the Ghost Ships - raise the Dreadfleet.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This Dwarfen settlement is a canker on our plans. Destroy it. Steal its secrets and then bathe it in fire and blood.

missions.localised_description: This Dwarfen settlement is a canker on our plans. Destroy it. Steal its secrets and then bathe it in fire and blood.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The mortal settlement of the false Emperor should be no more. Reap what you can from it and then bring fire!

missions.localised_description: The mortal settlement of the false Emperor should be no more. Reap what you can from it and then bring fire!

localised_description.last_approved_text: This settlement offends our Undead majesty. Steal anything of value and then burn it to the ground, if you so wish.

missions.localised_description: This settlement offends our Undead majesty. Steal anything of value and then burn it to the ground, if you so wish.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The accursed Greenskin blight of a settlement must be purged. Take anything of value and put the rest to fire!

missions.localised_description: The accursed Greenskin blight of a settlement must be purged. Take anything of value and put the rest to fire!

localised_description.last_approved_text: No Vampire has the right to exist - except our Lord - reap this lair. And then destroy it with fire.

missions.localised_description: No Vampire has the right to exist - except our Lord - reap this lair. And then destroy it with fire.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Summon a Wight King - this ancient warrior's martial skills will help our damned cause.

missions.localised_description: Summon a Wight King - this ancient warrior's martial skills will help our damned cause.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Vampire Count under our dominion is a powerful ally. Just remember, they are as ambitious in their quest for power as us.

missions.localised_description: A Vampire Count under our dominion is a powerful ally. Just remember, they are as ambitious in their quest for power as us.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The sorrowful wails of a Tomb Banshee are needed, their shrill screams should send enemies fleeing for their pitiful lives. Summon such a harridan.

missions.localised_description: The sorrowful wails of a Tomb Banshee are needed, their shrill screams should send enemies fleeing for their pitiful lives. Summon such a harridan.

localised_description.last_approved_text: We need a Necromancer in our legions. A wretched magic-user whose abilities will aid our unbreathing legions. Consider recruiting one soon.

missions.localised_description: We need a Necromancer in our legions. A wretched magic-user whose abilities will aid our unbreathing legions. Consider recruiting one soon.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Cavalry of the Undead is a fearsome spectacle, adding speed to our shambling forces. Add their might to our roster.

missions.localised_description: The Cavalry of the Undead is a fearsome spectacle, adding speed to our shambling forces. Add their might to our roster.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Our melee hordes can overwhelm any foe and will never succumb to mortal concerns such as fear. Raise them!

missions.localised_description: Our melee hordes can overwhelm any foe and will never succumb to mortal concerns such as fear. Raise them!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The pets of the Vampire Counts are fearsome Unliving creatures whose only desire is to serve. Read the books and summon them to our cause!

missions.localised_description: The pets of the Vampire Counts are fearsome Unliving creatures whose only desire is to serve. Read the books and summon them to our cause!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Nagash never took much stock in war machines but he was wrong. Recruit engines of death - make their deadly mechanisms work in service to us!

missions.localised_description: Nagash never took much stock in war machines but he was wrong. Recruit engines of death - make their deadly mechanisms work in service to us!
Success
Success

localised_description.last_approved_text: All are pawns of Chaos, all must serve. Do as the Dark Gods wish and begin the destruction. Thus is the way prepared for the End Times.

missions.localised_description: All are pawns of Chaos, all must serve. Do as the Dark Gods wish and begin the destruction. Thus is the way prepared for the End Times.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A loyal servant to the Chaos Gods is one that enacts carnage - that raids and destroys and scatters the mortals before him.

missions.localised_description: A loyal servant to the Chaos Gods is one that enacts carnage - that raids and destroys and scatters the mortals before him.

localised_description.last_approved_text: All hail the champions of Chaos, it is they who the eyes of the Gods fall upon. They are the ones that risk damnation in exchange for a chance of greatness - continue the slaughter!

missions.localised_description: All hail the champions of Chaos, it is they who the eyes of the Gods fall upon. They are the ones that risk damnation in exchange for a chance of greatness - continue the slaughter!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The destroyer comes, and with him the favour of the Ruinous Powers. The southern lands of milk and honey will wither at his touch.

missions.localised_description: The destroyer comes, and with him the favour of the Ruinous Powers. The southern lands of milk and honey will wither at his touch.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Behold the Everchosen! The Daemons rejoice for the End Times are here. Destroy and corrupt those that still hold out against the inevitable. Chaos has come - the world will be broken!

missions.localised_description: Behold the Everchosen! The Daemons rejoice for the End Times are here. Destroy and corrupt those that still hold out against the inevitable. Chaos has come - the world will be broken!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Karaz Ankor has fallen into decline, assaulted by fell enemies above and below the ground… but no more! Everpeak has stirred, the High King demands that the Dwarf realm be brought back to its former glory. Let the task begin in earnest!

missions.localised_description: The Karaz Ankor has fallen into decline, assaulted by fell enemies above and below the ground… but no more! Everpeak has stirred, the High King demands that the Dwarf realm be brought back to its former glory. Let the task begin in earnest!

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the Time of Woes a distant memory, the Dwarfs should look to the future and the restoration of the Karaz Ankor. The more territory around and even beyond their traditional mountain homes the Dwarfs can claim, the more the Ancestors will be pleased.

missions.localised_description: With the Time of Woes a distant memory, the Dwarfs should look to the future and the restoration of the Karaz Ankor. The more territory around and even beyond their traditional mountain homes the Dwarfs can claim, the more the Ancestors will be pleased.

localised_description.last_approved_text: There must be more Dwarf expeditions deployed - let them take the regions in the High King's name, and wipe out many grudges regarding those who stand against the Dwarf race. In this way the Karaz Ankor will be returned to its rightful glory!

missions.localised_description: There must be more Dwarf expeditions deployed - let them take the regions in the High King's name, and wipe out many grudges regarding those who stand against the Dwarf race. In this way the Karaz Ankor will be returned to its rightful glory!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chapter III: One Dwarfhold at a Time

missions.localised_title: Chapter III: One Dwarfhold at a Time

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Karaz Ankor will be great again, for Thorgrim has sworn it and the High King never reneges on an oath. Every Dwarf worth his beard bears the same bond. There are still regions outside of Dwarfen control, they must be brought under Karaz-a-Karak's dominion as soon as possible.

missions.localised_description: The Karaz Ankor will be great again, for Thorgrim has sworn it and the High King never reneges on an oath. Every Dwarf worth his beard bears the same bond. There are still regions outside of Dwarfen control, they must be brought under Karaz-a-Karak's dominion as soon as possible.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Not since Valaya and Grungni strode the mountains have the Dawi been in such a position. A few more realms taken will see the Karaz Ankor at its rightful stature - an empire ruled from Everpeak by a High King whose reign is as enduring as the mountains themselves. One last push, brave Dawi, one final push...

missions.localised_description: Not since Valaya and Grungni strode the mountains have the Dawi been in such a position. A few more realms taken will see the Karaz Ankor at its rightful stature - an empire ruled from Everpeak by a High King whose reign is as enduring as the mountains themselves. One last push, brave Dawi, one final push...

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chapter V: A Second Golden Age

missions.localised_title: Chapter V: A Second Golden Age

localised_description.last_approved_text: The election of a new Emperor has oft-led to turmoil as the machinations of the Elector Counts play out. But as the nobles conduct their petty power-struggles, the nation fractures. It is up to the newly-elected sovereign to begin the process of reunification - bringing an entire province under his rule must be a priority.

missions.localised_description: The election of a new Emperor has oft-led to turmoil as the machinations of the Elector Counts play out. But as the nobles conduct their petty power-struggles, the nation fractures. It is up to the newly-elected sovereign to begin the process of reunification - bringing an entire province under his rule must be a priority.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Even the worst Emperors in history, and - to our shame - there have been many, could claim to have more than one province under their rule. To truly bring the Empire back to greatness, the throne must exert its power to provinces further afield.

missions.localised_description: Even the worst Emperors in history, and - to our shame - there have been many, could claim to have more than one province under their rule. To truly bring the Empire back to greatness, the throne must exert its power to provinces further afield.

localised_description.last_approved_text: It was Magnus of Nuln that ended the turbulent Time of the Three Emperors, by defeating the Chaos Lord, Asavar Kul. In the wake of such a victory the Empire was united. To withstand another such invasion, we must be united again with more provinces under the Emperor's rule.

missions.localised_description: It was Magnus of Nuln that ended the turbulent Time of the Three Emperors, by defeating the Chaos Lord, Asavar Kul. In the wake of such a victory the Empire was united. To withstand another such invasion, we must be united again with more provinces under the Emperor's rule.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chapter III: As Magnus Did, So Shall We

missions.localised_title: Chapter III: As Magnus Did, So Shall We

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time of feuding Elector Counts and petty squabbles between provinces is over. The encroaching threat from the north cannot be ignored any longer. To face the armies of Chaos the Empire must be as one. Only then does mankind stand a chance against the Dark Powers and their minions.

missions.localised_description: The time of feuding Elector Counts and petty squabbles between provinces is over. The encroaching threat from the north cannot be ignored any longer. To face the armies of Chaos the Empire must be as one. Only then does mankind stand a chance against the Dark Powers and their minions.

localised_description.last_approved_text: This time will be known as the Age of Franz; not since Magnus the Pious has there been an Emperor so beloved of his people and successful in bringing the provinces under Sigmar's banner. Such glory infuriates the Dark Gods, and they will strike hard to destroy the dynasty of the Reikland Princes. Unite the last of the realms, for Chaos comes!

missions.localised_description: This time will be known as the Age of Franz; not since Magnus the Pious has there been an Emperor so beloved of his people and successful in bringing the provinces under Sigmar's banner. Such glory infuriates the Dark Gods, and they will strike hard to destroy the dynasty of the Reikland Princes. Unite the last of the realms, for Chaos comes!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chapter V: The Age of Franz

missions.localised_title: Chapter V: The Age of Franz

localised_description.last_approved_text: Grimgor's traditional stompin' ground was the northern peaks of the World's Edge Mountains, where he laid waste to Kislev and even marched through Sylvania, bedecking his banners with Vampire fangs. Since coming south to slap Gorfang Rotgut, Grimgor might as well hang around for a bit, and sort this sorry lot out. Gits.

missions.localised_description: Grimgor's traditional stompin' ground was the northern peaks of the World's Edge Mountains, where he laid waste to Kislev and even marched through Sylvania, bedecking his banners with Vampire fangs. Since coming south to slap Gorfang Rotgut, Grimgor might as well hang around for a bit, and sort this sorry lot out. Gits.

localised_description.last_approved_text: If the Greenskins are going to fear Grimgor - as they should - then he must take control and build up a great green empire from which he can launch an invasion to crush all enemies. The local tribes must fall into line or get a proper bootin'.

missions.localised_description: If the Greenskins are going to fear Grimgor - as they should - then he must take control and build up a great green empire from which he can launch an invasion to crush all enemies. The local tribes must fall into line or get a proper bootin'.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chapter II: Get da Gits in Order

missions.localised_title: Chapter II: Get da Gits in Order

localised_description.last_approved_text: It's time to stop messing around and put the boot in! The Badlands, the World's Edge, the Empire - all of it is Grimgor's! Destroy the trespassers, take their lands and get the Waaagh! started.

missions.localised_description: It's time to stop messing around and put the boot in! The Badlands, the World's Edge, the Empire - all of it is Grimgor's! Destroy the trespassers, take their lands and get the Waaagh! started.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chapter III: Put da Boot In

missions.localised_title: Chapter III: Put da Boot In

localised_description.last_approved_text: The momentum shifts as the Orc realms expand. The Dwarfs quail, the Empire shudders, even the forces of Chaos stutter as the Green Tide rises. Now is the time to bring outlying territories into Grimgor's clutches.

missions.localised_description: The momentum shifts as the Orc realms expand. The Dwarfs quail, the Empire shudders, even the forces of Chaos stutter as the Green Tide rises. Now is the time to bring outlying territories into Grimgor's clutches.

localised_description.last_approved_text: A Waaagh! is upon the Greenskins. The Orcs gather in great numbers and so they must bring as many regions under Grimgor's iron fist as possible - such an act will appease Gork and Mork and ensure that Grimgor's name is remembered for all time!

missions.localised_description: A Waaagh! is upon the Greenskins. The Orcs gather in great numbers and so they must bring as many regions under Grimgor's iron fist as possible - such an act will appease Gork and Mork and ensure that Grimgor's name is remembered for all time!

localised_description.last_approved_text: Since Count Mannfred's unfortunate defeat at Hel Fenn, Sylvania has been in decline. No longer is it feared as the dread land where the dead do not rest, but instead is seen as Stirland's bastard child. Now a von Carstein resides in Castle Drakenhof once again, it is time for the Vampires to take dominion over their haunted realm.

missions.localised_description: Since Count Mannfred's unfortunate defeat at Hel Fenn, Sylvania has been in decline. No longer is it feared as the dread land where the dead do not rest, but instead is seen as Stirland's bastard child. Now a von Carstein resides in Castle Drakenhof once again, it is time for the Vampires to take dominion over their haunted realm.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mannfred's influence must spread across all of Sylvania and beyond into the Empire itself if he is to realise his dread ambition of becoming the first and only Eternal Emperor. But before he can rule, a powerbase should be established and fresh troops risen for the challenges ahead.

missions.localised_description: Mannfred's influence must spread across all of Sylvania and beyond into the Empire itself if he is to realise his dread ambition of becoming the first and only Eternal Emperor. But before he can rule, a powerbase should be established and fresh troops risen for the challenges ahead.

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chapter II: The Spread of Undeath

missions.localised_title: Chapter II: The Spread of Undeath

localised_description.last_approved_text: Now is the time for Fell Bats to blot out the sun, for gloom to fall upon the lands of the living and the Long Night to begin. Mannfred's dominion shall extend far and wide if the prophecies in the Liber Noctus are to come true.

missions.localised_description: Now is the time for Fell Bats to blot out the sun, for gloom to fall upon the lands of the living and the Long Night to begin. Mannfred's dominion shall extend far and wide if the prophecies in the Liber Noctus are to come true.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Mannfred's fell influence saturates the lands, but for the scions of Sigmar's Blood to truly fear the power of the Vampires then all the Old World must be taken in von Carstein's name. Nothing is beyond the reach of the Midnight Aristocracy!

missions.localised_description: Mannfred's fell influence saturates the lands, but for the scions of Sigmar's Blood to truly fear the power of the Vampires then all the Old World must be taken in von Carstein's name. Nothing is beyond the reach of the Midnight Aristocracy!

localised_title.last_approved_text: Chapter IV: Behold the Midnight Aristocracy

missions.localised_title: Chapter IV: Behold the Midnight Aristocracy

localised_description.last_approved_text: The time is now - Mannfred von Carstein needs to make his move and take Sigmar's throne, or claim the lands from any foe - living or immortal - that dares resist the inevitable. Mannfred will rule over all as an Eternal Emperor - an immortal king that even the Chaos Gods bow to!

missions.localised_description: The time is now - Mannfred von Carstein needs to make his move and take Sigmar's throne, or claim the lands from any foe - living or immortal - that dares resist the inevitable. Mannfred will rule over all as an Eternal Emperor - an immortal king that even the Chaos Gods bow to!

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the Slayers to the fore, chanting songs of battle doom, Thorgrim’s throng sets forth for the Troll Country. Ahead lie countless dangers, but the Masters of Steel and Stone are ever dauntless, and if they should meet their end in the icy wastes, they shall do so with bright honour, climbing over the bodies of their defeated foes as they set foot upon the Path of Grimnir.

missions.localised_description: With the Slayers to the fore, chanting songs of battle doom, Thorgrim’s throng sets forth for the Troll Country.
