missions.localised_description: The time is now - Vlad von Carstein must make his move to take Sigmar's throne or claim the lands from any foe - living or immortal - that dares resist the inevitable. The Midnight Aristocracy will rule over all - as eternal emperors - immortal kings that even the Chaos Gods bow to!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The moon hangs low and red, like some engorged tumour, casting its crimson half-light across all of Sylvania. Isabella von Carstein watches it slink along the horizon and plots her next move.\n\nThough she and her husband Vlad have established themselves at the very summit of the Midnight Aristocracy, there are those who would yet try to undo them. To keep them at bay, Isabella must therefore employ ever darker methods. Whilst she plots and prepares, however, she must know more about her foes. As the blood red moon holds its sanguine gaze, she gives flight to a trusted agent; a speck against the celestial opposition, looming down from the heavens.

missions.localised_description: The moon hangs low and red, like some engorged tumour, casting its crimson half-light across all of Sylvania. Isabella von Carstein watches it slink along the horizon and plots her next move.\n\nThough she and her husband Vlad have established themselves at the very summit of the Midnight Aristocracy, there are those who would yet try to undo them. To keep them at bay, Isabella must therefore employ ever darker methods. Whilst she plots and prepares, however, she must know more about her foes. As the blood red moon holds its sanguine gaze, she gives flight to a trusted agent; a speck against the celestial opposition, looming down from the heavens.

localised_description.last_approved_text: The moon has passed into cloud and, when Isabella's agent returns, Sylvania is shrouded in a dark and baleful night. He speaks of insipid Sigmarites amassing nearby, and the Vampire matriarch knows that the Empire only ever comes bearing one thing - destruction. Her blood, such as it is, rises as the realisation dawns like a new moon; if they want war, then war they shall have!

missions.localised_description: The moon has passed into cloud and, when Isabella's agent returns, Sylvania is shrouded in a dark and baleful night. He speaks of insipid Sigmarites amassing nearby, and the Vampire matriarch knows that the Empire only ever comes bearing one thing - destruction. Her blood, such as it is, rises as the realisation dawns like a new moon; if they want war, then war they shall have!

localised_description.last_approved_text: When battle is done, the fields are soaked in less cruor than Isabella expected, or indeed desired. Such paltry forces could not really have been meant for her - for they were no threat at all, and could never challenge her Undead hegemony. There must be more to their machinations, she muses, as she drags terrified and hapless captive Empire soldiers into the bowels of her fortress to extract information in cruel and unusual ways.\n\nTheir dying gasps reveal that they were sent to capture not Vampires, but worshippers of Chaos - the savage, depraved Beastmen. Isabella is intrigued, even as her charges scream in agony. If she could deal with the Beastmen herself, the power they seek could be hers instead...

missions.localised_description: When battle is done, the fields are soaked in less cruor than Isabella expected, or indeed desired. Such paltry forces could not really have been meant for her - for they were no threat at all, and could never challenge her Undead hegemony. There must be more to their machinations, she muses, as she drags terrified and hapless captive Empire soldiers into the bowels of her fortress to extract information in cruel and unusual ways.\n\nTheir dying gasps reveal that they were sent to capture not Vampires, but worshippers of Chaos - the savage, depraved Beastmen. Isabella is intrigued, even as her charges scream in agony. If she could deal with the Beastmen herself, the power they seek could be hers instead...

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Beastmen are arrayed in their usual fashion - a random collection of hooves and grunts that bear no discernible sense of order - dangerous, yet chaotic. And there is something different about them this time - they hum with an unnatural radiance, shining with an entirely disconcerting power. Yet despite this, Isabella will not allow them to best her. She will drive them back, destroy them, and from their broken bones and bloodied horns discover their secrets!

missions.localised_description: The Beastmen are arrayed in their usual fashion - a random collection of hooves and grunts that bear no discernible sense of order - dangerous, yet chaotic. And there is something different about them this time - they hum with an unnatural radiance, shining with an entirely disconcerting power. Yet despite this, Isabella will not allow them to best her. She will drive them back, destroy them, and from their broken bones and bloodied horns discover their secrets!

localised_description.last_approved_text: The Beastmen have been destroyed. Isabella and her forces begin picking through the desiccated remains, eventually discovering a horn, thick with foul and pestilent blood, yet glowing with an alluring and altogether otherworldly aura. Though she cannot be sure, the sense of great darkness and dread leads Isabella to believe that this horn is one of the fabled Ruinous Gifts, bestowed upon the Beastmen by the Chaos Gods themselves. Although fascinated by it, Isabella knows that consuming this God-blighted cruor would tear her apart. She must consult those who know of these things - the dark and twisted Necromancers - to reveal more.

missions.localised_description: The Beastmen have been destroyed. Isabella and her forces begin picking through the desiccated remains, eventually discovering a horn, thick with foul and pestilent blood, yet glowing with an alluring and altogether otherworldly aura. Though she cannot be sure, the sense of great darkness and dread leads Isabella to believe that this horn is one of the fabled Ruinous Gifts, bestowed upon the Beastmen by the Chaos Gods themselves. Although fascinated by it, Isabella knows that consuming this God-blighted cruor would tear her apart. She must consult those who know of these things - the dark and twisted Necromancers - to reveal more.

localised_description.last_approved_text: Beneath a newly-risen blood moon, the Necromancers toil at their studies. Then, by the grim red light, they report their findings, revealing that the blood of Chaos can be purged and harnessed through completion of an ancient ritual, after which Isabella may safely consume it. The ritual requires, as these things so often do, a massive, living sacrifice, something on a scale that even Isabella finds shocking. The souls and blood would must then be stored inside a precious von Carstein heirloom. Isabella, already excited by the scale of the slaughter to come, fetches an ancient, exquisite chalice that was given to her by her great-grandmother, Countess Bathori, and readies herself to fill it.

missions.localised_description: Beneath a newly-risen blood moon, the Necromancers toil at their studies. Then, by the grim red light, they report their findings, revealing that the blood of Chaos can be purged and harnessed through completion of an ancient ritual, after which Isabella may safely consume it. The ritual requires, as these things so often do, a massive, living sacrifice, something on a scale that even Isabella finds shocking. The souls and blood would must then be stored inside a precious von Carstein heirloom. Isabella, already excited by the scale of the slaughter to come, fetches an ancient, exquisite chalice that was given to her by her great-grandmother, Countess Bathori, and readies herself to fill it.

localised_description.last_approved_text: With the slaughter over at last, the crimson moon seems pale now by comparison to the sanguine-soaked, beet-red settlements laid waste by Isabella. Through the Necromancers' spells the chalice hums with heathen energy, having consumed countless souls. Isabella knows that her time has almost come. According to her dark magicians only one stage remains: she must defile the resting place of a great and mighty soul. She knows of no greater soul than Marbad, First of the Elector Counts, and interred nearby. Soon, Isabella muses, she will sup on the blood of the Chaos Gods themselves! Gathering her forces beneath the cowering moon, she sets out for his tomb with unmatched thirst.

missions.localised_description: With the slaughter over at last, the crimson moon seems pale now by comparison to the sanguine-soaked, beet-red settlements laid waste by Isabella. Through the Necromancers' spells the chalice hums with heathen energy, having consumed countless souls. Isabella knows that her time has almost come. According to her dark magicians only one stage remains: she must defile the resting place of a great and mighty soul. She knows of no greater soul than Marbad, First of the Elector Counts, and interred nearby. Soon, Isabella muses, she will sup on the blood of the Chaos Gods themselves! Gathering her forces beneath the cowering moon, she sets out for his tomb with unmatched thirst.

localised_description.last_approved_text: As expected, the tomb is defended by a retinue of zealous, ignorant Empire troops. Standing between Isabella and her prize, the living fools are lined up before the tomb. Having travelled so far and achieved so much in the name of greatness, she will brook no resistance - smashing these fools apart to claim what she is rightfully owed - a power beyond any in history!

missions.localised_description: As expected, the tomb is defended by a retinue of zealous, ignorant Empire troops. Standing between Isabella and her prize, the living fools are lined up before the tomb. Having travelled so far and achieved so much in the name of greatness, she will brook no resistance - smashing these fools apart to claim what she is rightfully owed - a power beyond any in history!
